109b10(1): go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bsam tan
110a1(1): pa pa dang // gzugs byed pa'i 'grus sa gnas rababs pa ka sa nos pa dang / thos pa gsus la gnas nas las pag gos 'das rnab thos pa gsum sa gnas nas 'bas / 
110a2(1): dra pa nye bar banags ba'i sa gdas ras pasas gtad skom pa dang / yang dag pa'i spong sa pa'i sa gnas nas pasas gtan rnam pa dang / rdzu 'phrus rtsog pa ba'i sa gnas rnam pas ma gtam rlom pa dang / dbang ba sa
110a3(1): sa pams tu rloms dang / sa'i khams la gnas ras bsas gtad snyom ba dang / chu'i khams la ga pa nas bsam gtan thos pa dang / 'i khamasas gnas nas bas pa gtas gos bdang drung nitha bya
110a4(1): khams la gnas nas bas pa gtad zhom pa dang / ram pang shes pa'i khabs la gnas nas las ma gtan sgom pa dang / bde ba'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan smos pa dang / sdug sngal pa'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsas gtas
110a5(1): sgom pa dang // bde ba yang ma yin sdug sngal ba yang me yin pa'i tshor ba la gnas nas btan gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
110a6(1): ba gnas nas bsam gtad sgom pa dang / cung zad myed pa'i skyed la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed phyir skye mche dra la gnas nas bsam gtadan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten 'di la gnas nas
110a7(1): thasam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rtes pha rol la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chung ngu la gnas nas bsam gtas bsgom pa dang / 'du shes chen po la gnas shing bsam gtan sgom pa dang
110b1(1): 'du shes tshad myed pa la gnas nas bsam gtam sgom pa ste/ bsam gtan de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa nye b.ram le dad pa dang bcas pa/ chags pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dang bcas lnga
110b2(1): bsam gtan zhes bya ste/ bsam gtan 'di mi nyam thos dang rang sasangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun song ba zhes bya'o// go cha chen po'i khong lo ma yin/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chem po zhes kyi bya ste/ nyan pos dang rang sangs
110b3(1): rgyas thams cad kyis bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin mo// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po dang bral bsam gtan sgom pa
110b4(1): dang/ khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / skye mched dang bral yang pasam gtan sgom pa dang / 'dong ba'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan skom pa dang / gzugs kyi khams dang bral bar bsam gtar sgom pa dang / 
110b5(1): gzugs byed pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang // sdom ba gsum dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par 'a/ rang pa gsum dang bral bar bsam gtam sgom pa dang / drang ba
110b6(1): nye bar ga'agapo ba'i dang bral bar bas skos pa dang / rdzu thul yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang bral babasam bsam gtad sgom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa pa'i dang bral yang bsam gtad sgom pa dang / dbang po lnga dang
110b7(1): bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / stobs lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang bral bar bsam gtan skom pa dang // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa
110b8(1): dang / sa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / chu'i khams dang bral bar bsnam gtan sgom pa dang / me'i khams dang bral yang bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rlung gi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa pang
110b9(1): namakha'i khams dang bral dang bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde bar 'tsho ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug sngal du chod pa dang bral bar bsam gtan
110b10(1): sgom pa dang / stug snga la yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin par tshor pa dang bral yang bsam gtan smos pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan smos pa dang / ras shes mtha' yas skye mched dang bral 'ang/ 
111a1(1): bsam gtam sgom pa dang / cung zad myed cung yang byed myis skye mched dang bral yang bsam gtas sgom pa dang / 'du shes byed 'du shes khyed phyin skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtam sgom pa dang / 'jig rten ladza di dang bral bam
111a2(1): khabam gtam sgom pa dang / 'dzig rted pa rol dang bral bang bas pa gdun smom pa dang / 'du shes chung ngu dang bral ba bas ma gtas slob pa dang / 'du shes chen po dang bral 'ab bas ma gta sgom pa dang / 'du shes tshang myed pa dang bral bam sa
111a3(1): gtad snyom ze dang / thas gtang 'di mi chags pa'i 'od zeng cher po bskyed pa bga' byed pa nye bar len pa myed pa/ chags pa myed pa ste/ 'di'ini byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gta kyi go mcher po'i 'khang zhe
111a4(1): zhes bya'o// rig kyi bu gar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsas gtad phyi shos ches po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldam sa pog ma skyed pa ras 'dod ba la yongs su bsal te/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po'i
111a5(1): bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyasu thams cad las shi na tu 'das shing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / 1 pos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis margya
111a6(1): pa dang srung ba dang snyen bkur byed para'agyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bslas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' bsaHkhar pa// bdag gi khur lci spong ba'i phyir ni/ 1ny+dza
111a7(1): dmyigs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin sgoms te/ bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs gcod 'dong / yang dag mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid ma yis/ sdong la rtend cing rtog dang bcas pa// rngam par grol 'dod ting 'arings grong yang
111a8(1): tshu rol pha rol su la gnas sa// sems cad dag la las gnod byed byis// sems can kus la pan dang bde phyir te/ ting 'dzinang snyoms shing khung ldi spongs te/ kun nas nyor mongs pams cang gse lung ba// de'i yang dag
111a9(1): mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid// sems can thams cad tshim par byed byed// myi gnas ting 'dzind sgoms te// 'dod pa'i srid pa thams cad gsong la// de ni blo gros ches po zhes bya// sring bas bcing ba thams cad bkrol te
111a10(1): 'jigs pa myed pa'i grong tu 'dzud cig/ rab tu zhi ba'i ting 'dzin skos pa/ de mi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po mad/ 'dus pa cer po las byang chub
111b1(1): sems dpa' sa'i snying po la 'khor lo bcu pa zhes pa bya ba theg pa chen po la mngo / bam po dgu pa'o// / rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi do/ 
111b2(1): mchen po'i 'khong lo zhes bya ba yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo dang ldan na thog pa sems skyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bca yang te/ nyan pos dbang nga sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyad
111b3(1): thos dang dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang srung ba dang snyed bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar mashes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo/ 
111b4(1): zhes/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i shes la ni rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten gyi dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar ma byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i shes rab ce na/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa la rnamapa
111b5(1): theg pa gsum kyi gang gangs pa'i chos klog pa dang 'dod pa dang glegs pas du 'dri ba dang / nyand pa dang pa rolang la stonod cing 'tshed pa 'bal shis pa rtend te/ sems can thams cad kyi marig pa'i ma rig pa'i sum then
111b6(1): sa pa dog par cad thams cad rtsigs pa 'i slong kyi byang ba'i phyi / de bzhid gshegs pas gsad pa'i nya pob kyi/ pa dang bla pa'i chos sa shing tu ra pa'i bcor 'grus kyis tho/ 
111b7(1): dang 'don pa dang nyand pa dang glegs pa tu 'dri ba dang / gzhan la rgyas par stond cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i 'acon 'grus kyis nan tan byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas snyand pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / ldan pa'i chos
111b8(1): la klog pa dang / 'dond pa dang / nyand pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan la ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan du spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i theg pa chen po dang / ldan pa'i chos la
111b9(1): thon 'grus su klog pa dang / 'dond pa dang / hand pa dang / glegs pas su 'dri ba dang / gzhas la yang byas par btond cing 'chang ba dang yang dag pa'i bcos 'grus kyis nan tang byed pa ste// 'phags pa zag pa myed pa le lam kyi yang
111b10(1): ga tshol ba ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam chol pa ma yin// 'phags pa'i lam tu gtogs pa'i rnas par krol 'chol ba ma yin/ rab tu zhi ba yang dag pa'i shes rab la nan tad byed pa ma yin te/ rtag tu lwa ba dang bcas lamatsham ma dang brtsan
112a1(1): byed// de ku 'a pa 'ang gas padang 'am pa sa pas du rje 'di gyigs pa ce // shes pa chen pos dang drang sa rgyas
112a2(1): de lta bar byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rte la pa 'das pa'i gas rab cem/ 'di la sa byang chub sems rab 'dabs byang chub de lam la bzor 'bras su dang tar byed pa ni se nus su/ reg la gsus kyi 'angadag pa'i chos la klog pa dang / 'dod
112a3(1): thepas Sh+Ti / la kyim pa das stekhyed pa'i 'angab @/ ma bu'i
112a4(1): mi ba'i sems dang / 'brel ba dang 'brib 'byed pa'i shes rab dang / dbabaskyed pa'i sems dang / skye ba das/ dkog ba byed pa'i sems dang / phyi sti ldog pa'i sems dang / thos mnyam pa nyid kyi mos
112a5(1): de bzhis byed kyi sems dang / yang dag pa'i ma pa'i sems dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sems dang / bdag byed pa'i sems dang / rnas par kyi rtog pa'i sems dang / rab tuni bdang bzong ba dang / 
112a6(1): rtog lnga dang bras pa khrisems kyis grub pa dang / myi gnas pa sbyi chags pa'i mchog dab pa'i blo gros kyi sa la thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa / shes rab 'di ni len pa skyed pa la chags pa byed pas byang chub sems pa'i
112a7(1): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ge sa rab kyi go mchen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dralal sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi koN chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan ma/ thogs sems skyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga
112a8(1): yongs su cha lang pa'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan pos dang dang sangs rgyas kyi sa las shi nang tu 'das shingapa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / 
112a9(1): nya thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung pa deng snyed skur bya'o// rigs kyi bu ga'us yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhabs mkhas pa go ma chen po'i 'khor lo yod do// bya
112b1(1): chub sems dpanyam sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thogs sems skyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su saHla te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams da cad las shi nad tu 'das nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thos
112b2(1): cad kyi zhabs rnams kyi zhing chen por byur pa dang nyan pos rang dang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa chen po thams cad kyis mchod pa dang bsrung ba dang snyed dkrung byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar skabs mkhas pa'i gom chen po'i 'khor lo
112b3(1): zhe na/ rikaR+Sha kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa la rnam pa gnyis ste//  'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa la rnam pa gnyis te te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar sa byang chub sems dpal 'jig rten gyi/ 
112b4(1): thabs ma dzes baM yin zhe nang / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don nam gzhan gyi don nam/ gnyi ka'i don la bdag gi dang gzhan du rtog cing 'azo dang rgyu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bdag dang gzhan gyi don yongs su sgrub pa'i phyer/ sa ras
112b5(1): rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpal dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyen thos la mchod pa dang / snyen bkur byed pa dang / pha dang ma dang / rang pa dang ga nyam phag pa dang / 'gom dang rten myed pa dang // gnod/ 
112b6(1): bamapa pos sdug sngal yar gyur pa mthong na shi nang tu thabs mkhas pas sgrol zhing bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis/ sems can yongs su sminang par byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag theg pa chen po la/ 
112b7(1): gnas pas nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang / theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi dbang po yongs su ma smind pa la shidad tu phra la zab pa'i chos ston te/ srog tu gzhug
112b8(1): pa dang // 'phags pa'i bsam gtan la nan tan byed du gzhug go// gzhan yang don dam pa'i bden pa stand te/ nan tan byed du gzhug pa dang / byin ci log pa bzhi las zla zhing myi ltung ba'i chos kyi mtshan nyid rig par bya ba dang / so sa ya ba dag
112b9(1): par rig pa bzhi la gzhol 'ang bya ba nas gzhan yang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhing dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs yA dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags
112b10(1): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / lug sa dang bcas pa dang / lhag sa ma lus pa'i lam dang / lam gyi 'bras bu'i ba cu 'jug par bya ba la ma'as pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su sbyidad par byed do// sems cam gapa'i ra
113a1(1): grags pa dang longs spyod la chams dbang po 'dong pa dge pa'i rtsa ba yongs su smid pa la mi mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / ma mo smos pa dang / 'dod pa bye rgya dus pa dang/ sangs rgyas pa 'am gyis bgang 'bas
113a2(1): kra ka 'ang ba rnam par grol ba dang / mazung ba'i gzug lag 'dod grag cing 'don tu bcug ste/ yongs su spyi ra bar byed do// sems can gang sbyi pa byed pa la myi mos pa la ri ring po ched dbanod dbyin rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bas skul bas / 
113a3(1): su smind par byed do// sems can gapa wa'u gtum khI mi des rang bzhin tsam la tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi lo sku la slob tu bskul ba dang / sems can zhe sdang cem la bzod pa slol bar bskul ba dang / sems can le lo ca la ba thom nyams slong bar
113a4(1): skul pa dang / sems ca gapa sems g.yeng ba la ni bas pa gta sgom bar skul ba dang / sems can 'chal pa'i sems can la yang dag pa'i chos stonang pas bka' lung bda' srod cing lung 'bog la la thabs mkhas pas yongs su spri dad par byed do// 
113a5(1): sems can gang dkon mchog gsum la mngon par ma dad cing myi gnas pa dang myi spyod pa can la ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dkos mchog gsum la dad pa dang / dge bsnyen pa'i sdom pa slob pa
113a6(1): dang / dge bsnyen ma'i sdom pa bslabs khas yongs su smind par byed do// gzhan yang bzo dang rgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnas la slob cing spyod bu 'jud pas yongs su smind par byed do// de las tshogs pa'i byang chubakAk+Sha
113a7(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i shin tu bams ma las pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa si// mu krung gang ba'i bye sa rnyed pas mang ngo // de lta pa'i ge dang gzug lag dang gzo dang / skya thal gyi las kyi gnas pa pas cabs lug pa rje
113a8(1): spyod pa 'acos 'byas dang / babs mkhas pa'i seshes kyis mu stegs cas dab sa son bka' ra la lugs pa thams cad btu'ang ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'bas ma khas pa'o// thabs pa khas pa 'di ni nyan pos dang rang sangs rgyas
113a9(1): thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad gnas pa'i rgyur gyur pa thabs mkhas pa spyod pa'i gnas su gyur pa shi nang tu thabs mkhas pa lhun gyis grub pa rtog pa myed pa/ phyir ldog pa byed pa'i chos su gyur pa/ 
113a10(1): ba'o// 5/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang stonod pa las mkhas pa 'ang kyi rten// dge ba'i bshes gnyis la'ang myi ltos par 'jig rter gyi bas mkhas pa la nam tan byedas/ byang chub sems dpa' de sa 'i
113b1(1): rten gyi khams thabs mkhas pas rmongs pa yin te/ khams gsum du ltung bar 'gyur ro// de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shi nang tu thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes la gzhol zhing gnas par mya nus la/ thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yA
113b2(1): dag pa yang ma yin no// shin tu thabs myi mkhas pas sems can gyi dbang po dang / dpyod pa'i khyad par yang myi shes la shi nang tu thabs mkhas pa la yung thongs par gyu rad pas nyan thos kyi thege pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / phe na/ 
113b3(1): pa chen po'i sdod ma yin pa dang / theg pa cing po'i dbang thob pa sbyid pa dag la theg pa chen po stonong pa dang / slob cing mang tan byed du bcug thog// gang theg pa'i chos su gyur pa'i sems can la'i nyan thos dang ba sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos goT
113b4(1): cing nyan thos dang dang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la slob cing nan ta byed du bcug go// gang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i snod du gyur pa'i sems ca le ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa la slob cing man tar byed du bcug go/ 
113b5(1): kang nyer thos kyi theg pa'i snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni 'khor ba'i chos la khe ba dang / dga' bar stond te/ 'khor ba'i chos la skyo ba myed par myi stonang to// gzhas yang gi nang tu 'das mkhas pa la rmongs pas sos
113b6(1): sam gang srog gcod pa la dka' gnas de bzhin du log par lta ba'i bar du mos padag la ni shi nang tu zab pa theg pa chen po'i chos so rang ngo to// de la 'a khor ba 'di las 'chi bos nas pha rol tu skye zhing sdug sngal gyi 'bral
113b7(1): bu rnam par sbyin pa myong pa la skyo zhing 'jigs pa dang / sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos spong ba myi stonang to// gzhan yang shin tu khams mkhas pa la mongs pas sems can gang sru tshul khrims sru bas mos pa la ni sbyid par myod du bcug go// 
113b8(1): sems can gang bzod pa sgom par mos pa la ni bzod pa spong ba stond cing tshul khrims srung du bcug go/ sems can ka pa brtson 'grus pacom par mos pa la ni bcon 'grus spong ba stom cing bzod pa pyod du brgyag go// sems can ka pas
113b9(1): gtan sgom par mos pa la ni bsam gtan spong ba ston cing bzhon 'grus la nan tan byed du bcug ko/ sems can kar shes rab sgom par mos pa la ni shes rab spong bar stond cing bsam sgom tu bcug go// pa ltar byang chub seMs
113b10(1): dpa la 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du sems can la pham gad bde ba'i don byed myi nus te/ sems can thams cad kyi sdig pa'i grogs par gyur to// thabs mkhas pa 'di
114a1(1): kyims pa da/  mas paste/ 'didi byang chum sems dpa'i las rte kyisapa ma rnam pa 'is bya'o// beg yi ter gyi zhabs mkhas pa 'dzin/ 1 thas
114a2(1): rgyas kyi thon pa dang thung thongs yin te/ go chen po se ma yo ba yid/ byang chub sems dpa' sems pa sen pa zhes kyang kyi bya ste/ nyan thos dang nga sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bso dmas kyi zhing yang das 'am yin mo
114a3(1): de la ri ga ra byang chub ses sa pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gnang tubabs sa'as pa yid le/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dam sa bdag gi don bdang zhe/ gnan gyi dang srung byed pas/ bzo dang rgya bal
114a4(1): sna tshogs gdong bar gdod pas yongs su smidad par bya ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang / rab sangs rgyas rabapa sa la skye sru sa mchod pa byed pa dang / rang dang / bo
114a5(1): ba dang nyams zag pa dang / 'gon dang skyabs byed pa dang / shi nang tu sdug sngal dmang pos gzingang pa la thabs kyi sgrol ba dang / su pa'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can yongs su smyinang par byed de/ rtsi la mos
114a6(1): dang / dbang po dang snod bzhin du sems can la dam pa'i chos ston to// gzhan yang rims kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa slob cing nan tan byed par bskul ba dang / rang sangs rgyas hAhA
114a7(1): gyi theg pa pa de theg pa con po slob cing nang tan byed par sprul pa dang / gal te nyon thos dang rab sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dbang pos sbyid pa la si leg 'khor ba'i mug sbal kyi chos kyis skyo ba gor cing 'khor ba spyod
114a8(1): mya ngam las/ 'da' ba chol bar bskul lo// sems can gang srog gcod pa mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du chags gal ni dbang po dang / rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin 'khor bar 'khor ba'i chos stonang pa dang 'jig rten
114a9(1): nas 'chi 'phos nas pha rol tu skye ba/ 'di dang pha rold kyi sdug sngal 'bras bu myong ba bstan te/ sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos kyis 'a skye ba jigs pa dang skyo ba ston to// kha cig la ni nyan thos kyi nges pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos ston
114a10(1): to// kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos stond to// kha cig le ni bla na byed pa'i theg pa'i chen po la ste chos ston te/ khad kyis slob tu 'jug go// sems can gang sbyin pa la mos par gyu pa/ 
114b1(1): rnams ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mchog srung bar 'dod pa de bzhin du rgyas par sems can gang bsam gtan la mos par gyu dad pa la zag pa myed pa phags pa'i las kyi mchog gis bsdus pa dang shes rab bla na myed pa ston da cing
114b2(1): nan tan byed du bcug ste/ nga/ shi nad tu thabs mkhas pa 'di ni dmyigs pa myed pa dang chags pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las thabs mkhas pa'i go cha'i 'khor lo bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub seMs
114b3(1): dpa' sems dpa' ches po gang shind tu thabs pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thogs sems skyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su saHlang pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// 
114b4(1): nyan thos dpar ba sangs rgyas thams cad las shi nang tu 'das shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / 
114b5(1): bsrung ba dang snyen skur bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dgra gsal bar bslabs pa'i phyir// tshigs su bcad de bka' sam pang ba// shes rab nan tan rnam nyis te// 'jig rten bcas dang 'jig rten
114b6(1): 'das chags pa de ni 'jig rten bcas/ chags pa myed pa 'jig rten 'das/ gind tu thabs mkhas nang ta ni/ khyad/ par rnam pa gnyis la gnas// dmyigs pa yod pa 'jig rten pas/ 
114b7(1): dbyigs pa myed de 'jig rten 'das/ shen tub pas mkhas ran tan ni/ khyad par rnam pa gnyis la gnas/ dbyigs pa yod pa 'dzin te/ dbyacas/ dbyigs byed de 'i 'jig rten 'das// gapa'i
114b8(1): theg pa gcig stond pa// de ni legs par chos ston phyis// bdag kyang yongs su myi smin du ma// gzhan gyi don tu ga la 'gyur// gcig tu myi dge sems can la// theg pa gsum gyi chos storang to// 
114b9(1): de ni gti mug rmongs pa ste// byang chub chen po de ma yin// theg pa gsum la 'jug pa spro zhing // yang dag pa'i chos 'dod la// 'i glor par spro ba'i chos stond na// mkhas pa'i rang bzhin de ma yin/ 
114b10(1): rtsegs gcig blo yis rab rtags te// 'dod dang mos pa bzhin du stonang // 'di ni shin tu thabs mkhas pas// mkhas pa rnams kyis de la sngags// sems cad sdig pa dag spyod kyang // theg pa gsum
114b11(1): gyi snod 'gyur na/ dbang po cwo bzhin chos bstand te/ sdig pa kun las grol bar byed/ rigs kyi mebu gzhas byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa cher po'i ko ma chem po'i 'khor tho
115a1(1): byang chu ba sems dpa' sems pa' cher po gapa ma ma 'amings ldang/ thob pa sems paskyed pa ras 'dod pa nas lnga mongs su sa la yang te/ nya thos dang sangs rgyas pams cas pa ga ma
115a2(1): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dbang nga sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang bsrung ba dang snyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de kha me wA
115a3(1): byams pa ches po'i bo ma chen li zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa la rnam pa gnyis te/ chos la dmyigs pa'i byams pa dang / sems can la dmyigs pa'i byams pa dang / chos la dmyigs pa'i byas
115a4(1): ni byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// sems can la dmyigs pa'i byams pa ni byams pa chen po'i ga cha chen po'i 'khor lo bya'o// de ci'i phyir lem/ sems can la dmyigs pa'i byams pa sa
115a5(1): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang maphur song du 'gyur te/ nyan po pa dang rnaras sangs rgyas ni bas la pham pa dang bde ba'i dod kyi phyir sems cam byegs pa'i bzod pa la nam tan byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
115a6(1): ni bdag da'i ba dang bdag mya ngan las 'das pa dang / bdag gi sgrib pa gsel pa dang / bdag gis kun nas nyon mongs pa bcad pa'i phyir gyi/ sems can kyi phyir sems can la dmyigs pa'i byams pas brtson 'grus
115a7(1): la nan tar byed pa ni ma yin no// de bas na byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po zhes myi bya ste/ ko cha chen po ma yin no// chos la dmyigs pa'i byams pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dbang thur mong ma yin gyi
115a8(1): byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po rnams 'ba' shig gis nam ten byed nus par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpal sems dpal chen po na sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don tu brtson 'grus kyi sbyor bas chos la dbyigs pa'i byis
115a9(1): 'a chen pani sems pa mapa 'du she ga bya nga sasams pa dang ca can mams 'os sa bya gis su ba pa'i mas kyi rlom la byigs pa'i byams pa 'dems bya'o// de ba ba byas pa
115a10(1): sa bamam pa sa pa ba she tu gan sa sa bu sa sem pa pa ses pa di panyid kyi byig suzhes byas pa gas mi byed pa phung po sa phyi ba bye cings sdigasang / mams kyigs/  na
115b1(1): 'ag bar mams kyi gnas pa nas / byang chub kyis ma kyi lam lag gi bar du myi gnas so// 'dod pa'i khams la myi gnas gzugs kyi 'ams la myi gnas/ gzugs byed pa 'i lams la byi gnas/ 'jig te/ 
115b2(1): 'dil phyi gnas 'jig rten pa lo langs phyi gnas chu'o yod kyi su la myi gnas rold kyi bu la gyi gnas dmyigs pa la myi gnas/ phyi dmyigs pa la myi gnas te/ de ltar byed chub ses dpa' chos la naphyogs pa'i rgyas
115b3(1): ba la nan tan byed pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis theg pa'i sa las shin tu 'das te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' chos la dmyigs pa'i byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
115b4(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byams pa chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su sa ca yang te/ nyan pos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shi nang tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang
115b5(1): rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyer ro// kyis dang dang sangs rgyas kyi beg pa pa thams cad kyis mthong par grus depa dang bsnyen srung bya bar 'byung // de ras bcos las ras kyis ca
115b6(1): don 'di dag gsal bar bslas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' sam kha pa/ nyam thos dang ni rang rgyal ba// seMs can dmyigs pa byams sgom pa// / sems la bcu gsum skyon 'tshang zhing // bdag la phan pa'i don
115b7(1): phyir mthol// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen ni// sems can thams cad kun gyi phyir// thun mong ma yi nabyams chen sgoms// bcu gsum sems kyi skyon rnams spangs// dri ma bcu gsu dab spangs nas/ 
115b8(1): byang chub cher po ga zlos par byed/ chos la dbyigs pa'i byams skoms pa// bso dmus ning chub ri ba byed/ bcu ga su ma bas ma ba de gdas pa// sems can tham pas shinang tu lags// ji lu me ge'i rgyam ni
115b9(1): de// re dgas kun la grags pa bzhin// bcu gsum dgrarnams gi nang tu btul//  tag rang chang ba'i byar 'dzind bdus/ sems la gis kyang myi ngogs na// sbyang tu byang chub chen po batho/ rigs kyi bu gzhang yang byang chub sos
115b10(1): dpal sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po la 'khor lo yod de// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheche po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su soHkhang te te/ nya thos dang
116a1(1): rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shing du 'das pa// nyan thos dang ring sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur zhing // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'chod pa dang srung ba dang bsnyen bkur
116a2(1): byed par brgya son/ de ci'i phyir 'ad nyam 'os dbang bsangs rgyas khris sa cad de bdag sa par pa dang bse ba'i don kyi byed/ snying rjes 'byod kyi sems cas thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don tu snying rje chen po skyed pas/ 
116a3(1): yin ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po'i bdag pa 'grigs par ba dang bde ba'i dos kyi phyir snyib rje bskyed pa ma yin gyi// sems can 'ams cad la par gdang bde ba'i don kyi phyir snying je chen po bskyed do// de bas ma byang
116a4(1): sems bu ba can pa'i ga mamed pa'i mamang po dang mdapas cad thos dang nga sangs rgyas khams dang sasang gin tu 'das pa/ nyen thos dang rang sangs rgyal thams cad mam mams kyi zhing che thor 'byung ba dang / nya thos dbangs
116a5(1): rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang bsrung ba dang / bsnyed dkur bye par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sa sa can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don kyi phyir // slu ba'i ngo dra
116a6(1): thornam pa bzhis sems cad yongs su skyed par byed do// gling rje po sa sems car bags cad la yan pa dang bde ba'i ro kyi phyir/ sbyin pas yongs su 'asrud pa ni 'di sa da/ rinam po mi dang rob byin pa/ 1
116a7(1): theg pa dang bran dang las byed pa'i myi dang yul dang srid dab bu rang chub ma dang lus dang srog gi bar du yongs su gtong ba la gser sna byed do// phyi dbyigs pa'i dpyod pa la spyo bas 'phrul ba'i sems can long bar gyi 'thob// spyir
116a8(1): ba byed par phyi bzod // len pa phyi mthong ba nod kyi dngos por myi mthong // skyes pa spyod par myi mthong / sbyi pa byas pa'i 'bras bur myi mthong ba nas/ myi dbyigs pa'i bar du mthob ste/ de lta bu'i snying rje cher po bskyed do// 
116a9(1): sems cad thams cad kha phan pa dang bde ba'i don kyi phyir dag bsnyend pa dang don grub pa dang don mthun pas ci dang ces 'dul ba bzhin du myi dmyigs pa yang myi ma thong ba'i bar du / me dang des rgyas par ston cing 'ched do// de ltar byang chub sos
116a10(1): mapa' sems dpa' byed pas tag tu mchog das pa 'ayus pa'isems rab sa tu'i bakhrisems das/ da byed pa'i ses nga/ phung po dang sas dang / snyem ze thams cad la mded par 'ang gyi byed// pa'i bebs kyis ga sa
116b1(1): tu skyes kyang g.yol ba myed pa dang / myi gnas pa'i snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'dis snod tu 'gyur ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su smind par byed pa la skyob myed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen
116b2(1): po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang mthun mong ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang snying rje chen po go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldam
116b3(1): ma thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su gas rba khad te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shinang tu 'das shing nyan thos dpa rang sangs rgyas thams cad
116b4(1): cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang bsnyen bskur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar
116b5(1): bslas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' saHlad pa/ shi nad tu zab mo da dag pa'i chos dag/ snying rje chen po'i gzhir ni de gyu dang // shi na tu dpag myed nam kho 'dra ste// kanas pa myed de gzugs kyang myed pa'o// 
116b6(1): byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po// yon tan chen po dang ni ldan te// rgyal ba'i ye shes snying rje chen po sa/ dpal chos 'jig rten 'dra ba des 'gyur// 'gon dang skyabs byed sems
116b7(1): can dag ni// 'khor ba'i sdug sAl rnyog pas bcings pa// snying rje chen po'i chu'i sa bkrus te// sems can rnaM par grol bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' snying rje bskyed pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho slebs par byed de
116b8(1): las krol man byed do/ 9/ rigs kyi su gzhan yang byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po tshig so sor yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyibs dang mnyam pa tshad myed pa mtha' yas pa shis dbu rgya cher po dang ldan pa ji snyed
116b9(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos khams cad de/ ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / gi nang tu brtan pa bzod pa chen po'i go cha chen po 'i 'khor lo yang de/ byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po kang 'khor lo 'di
117a1(1): ldan na thog ma sems skyed pa nas 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shi nang tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du
117a2(1): 'byung ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang srung ba dang / snyer bkur byed par 'byung ngo // ngo la ji ltar na byang chub sems sems dpa' chen po'i tshig sa sa yang dag par rig
117a3(1): ram mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ chad byed pa/ mtha' yas pa shin tu rgya che ba dang ldan pa ji snyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ting nge 'dzi rang rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu brtan pa'i go cha chen po'i
117a4(1): 'khor lo zher/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad la shi nang tu rtog pa ni ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis ram mkha' kun tu ma khyab pa bzhin du sems mnyam pa bzhin du gyur pa
117a5(1): mtshan ma myed pa/ rten pa myed pa myi gnas bgos pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind thams cad kyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sems kyi myod pa myed pa/ myig dang gzugs dang myig gi rnam par shes
117a6(1): dang myig gi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi rnam par zhend pa dang bral ba sems kyi/ pyod pa myed pa las myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyed kyis rang gi tshor ba rnam pa gsum skye se/ bde ba dang sdug sAl dang / 
117a7(1): de sa yang ma mi mug sngam pa sang pa mis par chod pa la sems rab tu ni tshogs pa byed do// de ba'i mdun padang spang bang ba'i ngas pa shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'chus te reg 'a sa/ sA rang tha~Mngs ma
117a8(1): par shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce dang po dang / lI'i rnam par shes pa dang / lde'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus dang reg bya dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid dang chos dang
117a9(1): yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar tu bzhud de bzhin du rgyas par sems dang yid dang / rnam pa re shes pa thams cad rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa myed do// sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa las skyes pa/ 
117a10(1): bor banam gsung gi/ bde bar sug sngal sa 'des pa ste/ mi thug sas ma yangs yin dang sor ba la sems rtag tu'i ning cags pa byed do// rgyas gsum ze phung po dang khams dang skye bache rnams kyi ma gsas
117b1(1): kha lend pa byed pa sems kyi spyong ba byed pa'o// gang ci snye khams gsum dang 'du byed gsum dang reg bya gsum dang / sor ba gsum rang dbang po gsum dang / theg bu gsus pas/ sdom pa gsum ngas/ rnam par grol ba
117b2(1): gsus dang / rnam pa de ga thams cangs soms ba tu ni mgadas 'a byed pa mtshan pa skyed pa/ ledad pa byed pas gnyam pa nyid du gnas so// gang mi snyed sbyi pa dang / rgyal khrims dang / bzod ba dang / bzor 'grus
117b3(1): bsam gtan dang shes rab dang / pha rold tu phyind pa thams cad kha sems kyi spyod pa myed par rab tu zhi ma myed par gnas so// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
117b4(1): seng ga bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang pa yang sems kyi daskyod pa skyed par rab tu'i bar gnas so// gang ji snyed 'thad kyis snyoms par 'jug
117b5(1): pa dku la yang sems kyis 'askyod pa skyed par rab tu'i bar gnas so// gzhan yang mngon par 'du byed pa gsum dang / chos la sgrib pa myed pa'o// ye shes dang / lam gyi yan lag dang / las kyi rang ba'i ma 'dren/ 
117b6(1): par byed pa dag la yang lend pa myed pa/ sems kyi spyod pa myed pa kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang / kun bzhi'i rnam par shes pa ma yin pa dang / nye bar lend pa dang bcas pa dang / nye bar lend pa myed pa dang / zag pa de
117b7(1): bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa dang / tshu rol gyi mu dang pha rol gyi mu dang / chung ngu dang chen po dang tshad byed pa dang / byed pa drang byi byed pa dang / dge ba dang phyi dge ba dang / lung du gyi stong pa thams cad kyi rnam pa la byed pa dang / sems
117b8(1): kyi baspyod pa myed par rab tu zhi ba gnas so// gang ji snyed byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po rab babs ma khas pa'i rnam par sbyin par byed pa sa la bsrung bar bya ba byed pa gsum dang / phyi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos pa rje
117b9(1): pa maco brgyad kyi ba tu chos thams cad kyi rnam pa la lenang pa byed pa sems kyi dpyod pa byed pa rab tu zhi bar gnas so// byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po dag 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis tshol ba rnam pa gsum kyi nyes pa
117b10(1): yo ng+ge sum gsald pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongs su zhi ba dang / mtsham ma'i chos thams cad yongs su song bar 'gyur ngo ro// gzham yang ci snyed nam mkha'i myig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams
118a1(1): la thabs mkhas pa'i go che chen po'i 'khor lo yang 'drend par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpal 'khor lo po la gnas pas// gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa myi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te/ dran 'gro
118a2(1): gar byed pa dang / gan yang srid pa dang / la gro brdabs su 'khong bapa'akhong ba'i las thams cad lhag sa lum pang yongs su gsamam te/ rnam par sbyid pa'i 'bras su myi myong bar byed do// gzhang yang rigs kyi bu 'din/ 
118a3(1): chebum pa dag pos nam mkha' thams cad g.yog pa ra/ nyi ma gang ba'i tshe mu da pa 'ams cad gselang bar 'gyur ro// de bzhis byang chub sems dpa' yang tshig se ma sadru dag par rig sa/ 'ang sam mkha'i dbyings rang ste/ 
118a4(1): pa tshang myed pa mtha' yas pa yangs shing rgya che da go dang ldan pas ji snyed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin pa dang gzungs rnams shi nang tu brtan pa'i bzod pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang grub cingapa 'dren cing 'gyur ro// gzhan
118a5(1): !yang nam mkha'i myig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs la khams mkhas pa go cha chen po la 'khor lo gnas pas dpag tu myed pa/ nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi nyi mas phyin ci log bzhi'i nyi mun pa yongs su sarba la da te/ 
118a6(1): 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa myi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te/ ngam 'gro gnang mye da pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'kho nyer ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su la se kha ny+dza'u tu
118a7(1): rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu myong bar gyi byed do// gzhan yang de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la dbang thob pa dang phyir mye ldog par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du myi 'gro zhing / rjes su myi skyodang pa
118a8(1): ngon rtag tusangs rgyas mthong ba dang / skye bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi nye nas mthong ba dang kyi bral ba dang / dge 'dus la mchong ba dang / snyes pasun byed pa dang / bye bral ba dang / yon tam
118a9(1): cad la sems myi ngoms pa nas byang chub kyi bar du rgyun myi chad par rtag tu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang myi pral b+ha ni chung ngu na rmyi lam du yang ba chad byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub so swa da ba/ 
118a10(1): sems rag chen po'i rtsis ma sa yang dag par rig pa nas mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa cang byed pa ma ba skyems pa yangs gang rgya che ba dang ldar pas ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge'idzi dzas
118b1(1): gzungs rnams dang // shi nad tu brtan pa'i bzod pa'i go cha chen po la 'khor lo 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / nam
118b2(1): ma lalam pa 'as skye mched nas 'dugs byed shes byed byim skye mched kyi 'ar du slobs par 'jug pa dang / 'bartsegs 'ashos pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms par 'tshal gyi/ ting nge 'dzi dang 'di la gangs da tshong bar gyi gsu
118b3(1): byed gsum za mangs su bcad de/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang / g.yo ba'i sems kyi pyod pa byed pa tshor ba dang / bcu shes dang sems rabal dang reg pa dang yi la byed par lag sogs pa kur gcod par 'gyur ro// ti
118b4(1): 'dzind 'di la gnas na zhag gcig kam zhag bdun btum gyi bar du bsam/ gtan gyi zas za bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzind 'di las langs nas yang sems rab tu zhi ba le nad pa myed bcing ltar ner gnas par 'gyur ka/ 
118b5(1): yi mu ka na kun nas zil ta ma rar gyi thigs pas skams sngar ma lA mu mngon par byang bas kun nas nyon mongs pas bcings po la yongs su gdung ba thams cad seyang bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin de zhes langs nas ya
118b6(1): dag pa'i drang ba thob ste/ dga' ba'i khyad par can gyis lus khyab par gyudad pa ni ci ltar lnga'i sras dang dbang phyug chen po bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'jug pa na/ yus kyi ba spu'i khung bu kun nas rab tu bde ba zhe/ de ltar
118b7(1): byang chub sems dpa' ro lus la bde ba reg pas sangs rgyas ches su dran par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas sangs rgyas mthod pa las mnams gzhan mthong ba skyed pa// byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe sangs rgyas gci
118b8(1): yid la byas na sangs rgyas gcig mthong ngo // gal te sangs rgyas mang po yid la byas na sangs rgyam mang po pa'ong dor / gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku chu pa yid sa byas du sangs rgyas kyi spu dru bdu mthong ngo / 
118b9(1): gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku ches por yid la byas ma/ sangs rgyas kyi sku chen po mthong ngo // gal te sangs rgyas kyi s+ya tshad myed pa yi la byas ma sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad myed par mthong ngo // gal te bdag gi lus sangs
119a1(1): rgyas kyi mtshan ldan par yid la byas ma bdag gi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku rang 'dra bar mtsham phun gsum tshogs par mthong ngo // gal te gzhan gyi lus sangs rgyas kyi skur yid la byas na gzhan kyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku ngas
119a2(1): 'dra bar mtham zhun gsum tshogs pa mthong ngo // gal te sems can sems ca ma yin pa 'i steng gzugs su gtogs pa/ khams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku dang mtsham dang ldan pa pa yid la byas ma/ sems can dang sems can pa yin pa dang gzugs su/ 
119a3(1): gdosos pa mas sa ma rgyas kyi srungs na ba mthar su dum 'ogs par 'tho 'i gzug pa gas tu phyi mazang sa// byang chub se pa pas ro gas drems mos bams ca dang lugs dang smra ba das na sa te yang ga pa sa yinas da
119a4(1): gis sor ba nas gsum dang / 'du byed rapa gsum les sogs pa cos thams cad lus pa ma lus pang yongs su gcod do/ snyam nus 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzidang la snyoms pa zhugs so// ting de 'dir nga de la gnas ras zla lnga tu gas
119a5(1): bzhin du thams cad gcad de/ ting nge 'dzind kyi ro'i las kyis 'tsha lo// gal te/ dA zhag bdun nas gdum gnyis/ sas brgyan pa'i sum zhus pa'i 'am lnga 'am drug gas bdun ngam brgyang ngam/ gal te skal ba tshad pa bye ba khrag
119a6(1): khrig stong gi bar du ci nus su gnas te/ ting nge 'dzin kyi zas pa'o// ting nge 'dra nad de las langs nas sems rab tu zhi dpes ci la yang myi chags te/ bde bar gnaso gnas gal te don dam pa'i mthas gtugs 'i
119a7(1): ting nge 'dzind tu zhugs na yang sngar ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang ldan pa yid la bya ba nas/ chos mas cad dang gzugs thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra sa/ yang dag pa ma yin ba'i bar du chud par byed do// 
119a8(1): rigs kyi bu 'di byang chub sems dga' sems dpa' cher ba'i phyig thos yang dag pa ris pa / nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyas pa/ mang myed pa mtha' yas pa yangs shes tu ge ba dang 'ang ba ce snyed sangs rgyas pa kyi chom
119a9(1): thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang gzungs thams cad dang shi nang tu brtan pa'i bzod pa chen po go cha chen po'i 'azhom lo zhes bya stes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga'akho lo 'di dang ldan ma
119a10(1): nam mkha'i myig dang spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs rnams la shin tu thabs la mkhas te thams cad lhag saH lus par spangs te/ rnam par smyid pa'i 'bras bu le nang par gyi byed do// gnam ya rigs kyi bu
119b1(1): zhi the 'di'i che gyi khams su myed papa 'dzin dang thung du nye bas/ nyis sa sarig rte gyi khams mardzi cu dang rdzing chen po dnga'abab rgya nga 'bab su med padang / mchi sa mtho chen po'i mun pasas/ 
119b2(1): pha ma zhus pa thams cad skems par 'gyur // de bzhis du byang chub sems dpal yang cig so so yang dag par rig pa/ rnanas mkha'i dbyings dang mnyes pa tshad myed pa ma 'a lums pa yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldam ngas
119b3(1): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ bting nge 'dzid rnams dang gsungs dang gi nang tu brtan pa'i bzod pa chen po gocha chen po'i 'khor lo yang mngord par 'dres to/ ka'am yabaras mkha'i byig dang spyi bo'i ting se 'jims rnams/ 
119b4(1): dang / gzungs rnams la shinang tu thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la yang gnas shing 'dren par 'gyur ro// gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa myi dge ba'i lha ga mas gnyer te/ ngam 'gro gnang myed pa dang gzham lan
119b5(1): su 'dzin te/  yi ten tu rgya'on 'jig pa byung na/ gong gsum gyi nos chen po'i la rten gyi'ams 'di'i kham sa snang chu'i sring byer pa ngab gling bra 'argyas me pa pi mtshi'i rgyam tho dang /  tha
119b6(1): cang chu yis bkrus te/ zhig nas lhag ma ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang tshig so so yang dag ga nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ zang byed pa yangs shing rgya che ba dang sngar ba
119b7(1): snying sangs rgyas kyi chos thams de/ ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shi nang tu brtan pa'i bzod pa go cha chen po la 'khor lo yang grub cing 'dren par 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i myig dang sprin po'i ting nge 'dzin
119b8(1): rnams dang gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la gnas shing 'dren par 'gyur bas 'das pa'i rgyas kyi sdug pa'i myi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas mnyend te ngan 'gro gnang myed pa dang gzhan ya srid pa
119b9(1): dang 'gro ba rnaMs su 'khor bar 'khong ba'i las mkhas pa'i go cha chen po la 'khor lo la yang dag par gnas par gyur ro// 'khor lo 'di la gnas pas dpag tu myed pa nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi nyi ma 'byub bas rang
120a1(1): la byed// sred pa'i ga sa sa rnams dang grol pa'i rgya
120b1(1): bsam gtan dab snyoms shing // 'thos pa'i ti ta 'dzin stong pa nyid gas so/ sangs rgyas dran pa'i blo macos dang skye sdig pa thoms ca yongs su mar 'gyur ro// yong da byed pa'i chos rabs thams cad de/ 
120b2(1): yang dag stong pa nyid tu rtags pas bcom// ngas par 'gro ba'i rgyud rnams yongs sam 'ang nas// rtag tu sangs rgyas mang po mthong bar 'gyur// yang dka stong pa nyid la rab snyoms pas// dge ba'i chos cas gzhan kum la brtson bya sa/

120b7(1): chang byed grangs byed pa rnams chos 'di thos nas ting nge 'dzin kyis 'chos me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo tho bas cad tho 'o// gzhan yang sems cad cad skyed grangs byed gangag ma bcom ldas 'das kyis bshad pa 'on
120b8(1): nas/ ni 'ba' bas khro ba'i glog gi bo la rnyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo po khams cad 'ong za/ gaga'ang yong sems can tshang byed grangs byed pa dag na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gab 'a thos ras// chom la byu
120b9(1): 'o snang ba la rnye bar byed pa rjes su mthun pa'i 'ashod pa thams cad thob bo// gzhan sa pa sems can cad byed grangs med pa cos ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas tshul dang dri ma dang bral te/ choms chon kyi byin rje'ang
121a1(1): bskye so/ rjeng cu chugs pa'i 'bras bu mthas/ ga'ang yang sems pan cad byed zangs byed pa dngag gis 'ayom bldas sa kyis bgang pa 'omam nga ni khyod kyi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu b.ram/ 
121a2(1): gzhon yang semasasas cad byed grangs byed pa dag bco ba ldan 'das kyis la ga pa 'os nas lan cig phyir myi ldog pa'i 'bras bu 'o zag/ gzha yang sems ca cad byed mangs byed pa de// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshang 'a 'os
121a3(1): ga gi mthatha pa'o// sems can tshang byed blangs byed pa das sa pa ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thomams lams gsum gyi tho nam byung ba krol bas bcog ldan 'dustsas ted cing rag tu byang ras yang dag pa'i tshig lasum
121a4(1): 'ang byung to// gzhan yang sems can tshad skyed grangs byed pa dag nas mtsho'i bar tu dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam the'i bur ka sa gnas par shes/ nyam thos kyi theg par sems skyed pas byir myi log par gyur to// ka'am
121a5(1): yang sems cad tshad byed grangs byed pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshang ba thos nas nam mtsho'i bab tu dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bde ba gnas nas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par sems skyed pa khas phyir gyi ldog par byung / 
121a6(1): to// ka'ang yang sems cad tshad byed grags myed pa dag brtsom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas rnam/ 'tsho'i bar du dge ba bcu'i wa sa kyi lum la bde bar gnas nas theg pa cher ba cher po sems bskyed cing16
121a7(1): bla ra byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub khas phyir myi ldog par gyur to// gzham yang sems nam tshad myed grangs myed pa dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bgang pa thos rnab 'jig rten yang dag pa'i lta ba thob par 'gyur te/ yang dag pa'i
121a8(1): lha ma de'i dbang gis ngam song su 'gro ba'i rgyangang kur ras nyod mongs pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad byang nas mtho rim bu rgyud pa yang dag pa'i spong lam dang dge ba'i las thams cad spyi zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro// gzhan sa sa
121a9(1): can tshad myed grangs byed pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas dkon mchog gsuM la skyabs su song ste/ dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa blangs nas sangs rgyas mchod pa la spro ba dang / thos pa la dga' ba dang / dge 'dun gyi g.yo
121a10(1): byed pa la mos te/ nyis mtshan du 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus la sems par tshad myed par 'gyur ro// gzham yapa sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa thos nas log pa la 'bab pa dang log pa la phyogs
121b1(1): ba dang bre gros ngang pa dang khas ngang ba thams cad yongs su spangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la myi 'gyur ba'i rang pa bos nas khyim nas gnas pa'i chos yongs su spangs te/ rnam par dag pas rab tu byung bar gyur to// de nas bco ba ldan/ 
121b2(1): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po ram mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' sarba lad to// rigs kyi bu ras sa'i snying po'i 'khor lo bcu pa zhes pa brdal spong ba ches po chos kyi sgo po 'di khyod kyi lag tu btad kyib khyod kyis
121b3(1): lag tu btad kyis khyod kyis gzungs su gzung la rgyas par gyis shig/ sems cas gang chos kyi ni grangs 'di la klog gam 'dor tam yid la byed dam// gzhan la rgya cher 'chang dam/ yang dag pa'i 'apyod pa la gnas pa dag la khyod kyis chos rnam pa 'di bcus
121b4(1): bsrung ste/ yun ring bor phan pa dang bde ba'i don thob par gyis shig/ gcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ de'i thabs dang bdog pa'i nor thams cad bsrungs te nyams par myi bya ba dang / gnod pa thams cad las srungs ste gnod par bya/ 
121b5(1): babyed pa dang / log pa sa pa sa log par phyogos pasas rdzas so/ phyi ge bcu'i las kyis ma grang ba bya ba dang / ro'i gyu dpag sa gdod pa thams cangasas smras te/ byed pa bya snga
121b6(1): bskud pa thams cad las srungs te/ myed par bya ba dang tshul khrims dang / spyod pa thams cad nyams par bye 'gyu la bsrung ba dang de la gyi sa mi na pa thams cad/ myi dang 'byung ba chen por khrugs pa dang / tu la ma yin pa'i ra/ 
121b7(1): dang myi dkas pa thams cad yongs su sel par bsrung ba dang / des nus pa yin pa chub ma yis pa ltas ngan pa rims thams cad kyi 'byung bar srung ba dang / de 'chi ba'i nus byed pa ni yang sangs rgyas thams cad sas thong bar spang
121b8(1): dang / de'i 'che' bos nas kyang bde 'grong skye ba dang pham pa dang / bde ba'i don thob par yongs su sbyar thar gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu sems cam gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di klog pa ram/ 'don pa dang yid la byed pa dngaka' ma
121b9(1): la rgya cher 'tshang nas yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa das la khyod kyis rnam pa 'di brgyas shin tu srung zhing byind kyis rlabs te/ chos rnam pa 'di brgyas yur ring po par ba dang bde bar gyis shig/ de ras byung
121b10(1): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i nam mkha'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rngam grangs 'azungs su 'dzi rad cing shind tu
122a1(1): sa pa na gyi'o// sems can gang chos kyi ram grangs 'di la klog pa dang 'dod pa dang / don ming sa bgyim pa dang / pa ma po la rgya cher gnod pa dang / yang dag pa'i bsdod pa la gnas 'das pa
122a2(1): gshegs chom rnam pa 'di sargyas shin tu spangs te/ yun ring po phan pa dang bde bar 'gyi'o// de nas bcom ldan ladas kyis mdo'i 'di gsungs nas mdzangs kyi dkyil mtsha der 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' so
122a3(1): dpa man thonam pa pa'i byeng 'ong / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ben pa'i rnying pa dang / byang chub sems dpa rkye ba cwa rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'in par the tso ma 'dri ba das / sa

122a9(1): pa'i phyis kyis rlabs / byi rtags pa'i stod gsum kyi 'i shes sa 'jug pa dag kyi cher pong rab tu byed pa drud pa dang rlo gros dang / rtogs pa sa bya/ kun su sa snang hA/ 'i gel kyis ram par myong pa'i po'i rang ba'i
122b1(1): ma mi pa' 'bre ba phyi ma'i maba'i skal bar mngon tu stong pa yon tan gyi tshogs pams cad dpag tu myed par 'azhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das chos mams cad kyis nyam pa nyid ni mngor par tshogs pa song
122b2(1): rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor lo na rab tu skor nga / slob ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tsho gas ni/ chos thams cad la mnga' rnyes/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i bya ba ni shin pa tu mkhyen/ dbang po dman pa'i pha ro khang tu byed
122b3(1): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi tshems spyod pa yang dag par 'jom pa la ni mkhas shing / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun kyis kya grub pa ni rgyu ma bcad do// dge slobs ya phrag drug gi dge slong gi dge 'dus
122b4(1): chen po dang thabs gcig ste thams cad kyang cangarigs kyi sems 'am dang lnga na pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shi nang tu rnam par grol ba nyon mongs pa thams cad bag chags kyi choms sbyor ba// yang dag par

122b6(1): grangs myed bsom gyis sgri ma bya ba tshungs pa skyed gzhal tu myed pa/ zad myed pa 'jod du myed pa'i yang brjod tu byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang babs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang sems kyi skad cem
122b7(1): gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya ba la mkhas pa/ chos nyan pa la myi ngoms par yang dag par tshol ba rtag tu rgyun gyi chang 'ang sos
122b8(1): ma sacamasas su sbyid par ba sa brtson pa/ bam shig mangs pa'i g.yos tu bye pan/ sgrib pa byed ba'in pa pa ma nga ba sa ba ga ga 'a rnas pa tog pa slo ma
122b9(1): yos gangadas par 'ongs so// thams ca sa byed pa'i ye nyes gnye bar gyu dpa ga ha gag la den stebyang chub sems rapa 'a grog gi wa zhes bya bdang / byang chub sems das zhugs pa rnam la

123a3(1): sum gyi nong cher po'i 'jig rter gyi khams dang/ gzugs su snang ba ldag sa gro'ad bsas cad byed par gyur te/ thams cad kyang nam mtha' ga bur gyur bapa snyam du shes so// 'di na ste dper na ba skal pas gis
123a4(1): bregs te/ nam ma la' sanis kyangs pa ra / stong gsum kyi sod cher po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma/ gzugs su snang ba yang med kyig srung gang bar gyi 'tha 'de bzhin tu ro'i cher/ gang gzunas su sna sa rnam
123a5(1): sems can dag gi myig sngar myi snang bar gyu rang do// 'di lta ste dper ma de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa/ gcig pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi khab pa rtsegs pa/ 
123a6(1): yongs su longs spyod pa de 'dra ba'i khang pa chags pa de na snang // nam mkha' la khang pa chags pa 'dug sa/ de dag ma gtogs papa stong gsum kyi stod ches po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dis de kham steng gi ga'i'i bar du sa
123b1(1): cad kyang byi snang ba snyam du rab tu shes te/ ri'i rgyal po ri ba dang / 'khor yug gi ni dang / 'khod yug gi ri che po dag sems can gang ki byig snang yang myi snang bur gyur to// grob dang grob khyer dang / grong brdal dang ljongs dat+ta/ yul
123b2(1): ma 'od dang / rgyal po'i lo bral 'bod rnams kyang kyi snang ste/ ka'am du ni nam mkha'i dkyil ma gnas pa'i khang pa/ legs pa de dag nyid du shes zheng / bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri mi dbangs su dpag ca zhing 'bags par rnaMs rtswa sA rdzo// 
123b3(1): ba la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i seng ge'i khri'i 'od kyis kyang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ gang stong dugasum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nyi ma dang
123b4(1): zla ba dang / skar ba dang / rgya byed dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rter skyong pa'i 'od te ngas thams cad kyang rmyi mog mog por byas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khom de dag thams cad kyis/ 'di lta bu'i tshe 'byal po mdzam/ 
123b5(1): rmad du 'byung ba 'thod nas phan tshun tu smra ba/ khang pa chags pa 'di kod pa/ ci 'dra ba de ning ga dag cag ki tshe'i tshad/ skalang par 'dug par gyur dad kyang bdag cag gis rgya cher rnam par dbye ba stanang par sla ba ma yin
123b6(1): tede tsam du khang partsegs pa/ 'di dag gi yon tan bkod pa tshad myed do// zhes je dad to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus gnas brtan sha ri'i bu kha palegs pa de nas langs nas/ rnam mkha' kha 'dug
123b7(1): ste/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga btud nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal po smra dad pa btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nas mkhal la mchis pa'i khab pa legs pa
123b8(1): 'api ma khegs pa// gzhan stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkhar gyurd cing // nam mkha'i rang bzhin du 'da' ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHyad pa/ ga ri'i

127b9(1): su bcad pa 'di dag spras nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i byeng thos nas// phyi mched kyi 'jig rted gyi khams
127b10(1): 'dir bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang / snyen bkur bgyi ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang chos snang bar bgyi ba gang bcu zad stand pa'i slad du 'dir mchis so// bcom ldan 'das ka skyes bu
128a1(1): dam pa 'di dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dab rang gi chos la the tsom du gyu rad pa'is bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo la rab tu gnas pas/ 
128a2(1): de ga gi the tsom thams cad kyang rab tu sa cing / sangs rgyas kyi mos thams cad sdang bar bgyis ya lams so// bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhi gshegs pas bdag la skabs byes/ chos rnam par nges pas 'jug pa 'i
128a3(1): mkha' mchid bcu pa zad cig bdag bu'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ni phyi chags pa'i ye shes can te/ sems cad thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yags pa mkhyend pa yo shes la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'ad
128a4(1): 'a / mas thams thamam sa na drem khye / ga thams cad nga rgyang bye pa'i migs la mam / bcob nga kyisas kyid pa yongasas kyi 'ang ba'i byung bar sru sa
128a5(1): ba ldang sam ma myod sa byed pa/ sems ca tham sa dngam po song ba'i das pa chos sod dpa / bcom ldan 'das nirnam pa nobang pa ste/ mngon pa shes pa dang 'gyub mi rkadang pa rnam par nges pa / 
128a6(1): gis la sa las pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni shin tu rna la gzigs pa'i bro ldar pa ste/ sems cad thams cad kyi sems kyi dpyod pa phyag de kyi 'jog par kun sor dpa / bcom ldan 'das ni mngon par grags pa/ tra
128a7(1): myi gzug skar gyi mnong ba bcom ldan 'das ni'i lang kyis gnon pa ste/ song gsum kyi gong chem po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mang bel tho gcog go// bcom ldan 'das ni rang byung ba ste/ sbom dpo byed pa chom
128a8(1): cad rang gis mngod par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa// bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren pa ste/ 'dren pa bye myed pa// rapa las ngan par zhugs pa rnams la yang dag pa'i lam stonang pa/ bcom ldan 'das de sngan pa'i rgyal po ste/ ma
128a9(1): ma dngotha ma ma mchis pa'i 'dod pa dang nyon mongs pa dang / kun tu sgrib pa dang / shinang tu bsgrib pa dang / kun nas ldang bas sgribs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa rnams ni nang ma mchis pa 'chib ma mchis pa'i gnas kyi
128a10(1): la rab tu 'gyod pa// bcom ldan 'das ni stobs dang dras shul 'chang ba ste/ gnas dang sangs ma yin pa ma byed pa la ma 'as shing gsum rig pa'i rig pa snyes te/ bcom ldas 'das ni myi 'jigs pa chen po 'asnyes pa se
128b1(1): brag pa pa cing sanyam pa nyid mdzes par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par blang ba ma byed pa la mkhas pang / sde dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun tu l+h+wamachog seng ge'i sgra spog la/ bcom ldan 'das mi ma
128b2(1): rgyas kyi chos pa 'dres pa dang ldan pa se/ dus gsum la thogs pa myed pa'i ye shes can// bcom ldan 'das mi sku dang gsung dang thugs yong su 'angag pa ste/ khrul ba dang caco byi mnga' ba/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang // rnam par rlon
128b3(1): ba'i ye shes gzigs par/ bcom ldan 'das ni byams la chen po la gnas pa ste/ zhe 'bras pa byed pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/ nam mkha' dang tshul pa'i sems kyis gzigs pa'i spyan dang lda
128b4(1): bco ldan 'das ni thugs rje chen po la gnas pase/ legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa dang / bde ba dang sdug sngal khas kyi skyong ba// sems can thams cad la mnyam par 'jug pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam
128b5(1): ba ste/ mnyam pa'i legs gnyis su byed pa zhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ni bye brag byed pa ste/ nam ma lal ga bung gin tu rnam par dag cing sems/  na pa mnyam par spyod ba// bcom ldan 'das mi 'dos pa skyed pa de shi shes rab kyis/ \u0f85d+ho
128b6(1): marje ye yes gnyis su byed pa drobs pa ste/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa dang bral/ bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/ s+ya lnga'i tshul yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'dra
128b7(1): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dang chos dang / ye shes tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan par bdag gis rig nas chos rab tu brjod pa'i sgo yongs su zhu bar 'tshal te/ gus pa dang bus cing chos la gces su bgyi ba dang ldan pa ste/ nga rgyal ma mchis shing sos
128b8(1): car thams cad chos la sbyor ba dang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye ges kyis mngon par sgrubs pas chos 'tshal ba'i slad tu de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu'o// de skad ces gsol ba la dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpal
128b9(1): sems dpa' chen po rnam ma kha'i mdzong la 'di skad ces gas // skyegs pa legs so skyes zungs pa/ ji skang khyod ga la'i klung gi bye ma rnyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dris pa rnams lung gang 'a po la/ rigs kyi
129a1(1): thoms dpa' phes dab cher po yong tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba ma tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ gas rnams sems dang sems la sems yid chungs// shin kyungs su sems ye shes mnyam la gangs/ 
129a2(1): sems la sems myed par mi zhugs pa'i tshul// der ga don tu rgyal bdag zhu'o// sdud pa thob cing mun pa dri ma myed// yid nyis cas kyi yid gnyis blo gcong ba// nges byas rnam par tham pam pa rang ba lag gzhag pa/ 
129a3(1): de dag ched du bde bar gshegs la zhu// bdug la bdag byed shinang tu rnam dag yid // sems can don zhugs sems cad byed/ la dkal// sems cad bdag myed gnyis la tha byed pa// rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi gtam 'di 'o/ 
129a4(1): chog spyod brtul zhugs yongs su dag/ bsas dag cing sems mi nam mkha' 'dral// ldum po lta bur brtan zhing myi gsol ba// de dag ched du yon tam mdzad la zhu// gyi grogs brtan pa 'artsor 'grus kun nas bzang // dpa' bo
129a5(1): bdud kyi sgra'i pa rgyal bcom 'o/ nyon mongs rab tu nyon mongs dri spyod bamathong dga' de dag do su ba'u'o // thos sbyin tshul khrims bzod pa bcos 'grus dkal/ du bsas gtan nam tha nga shes rab
129a6(1): tu byung // mdod shes bsam gta shes rab nas grol ba'i 'dod rab dag dri byed don tu bdag zhu'o// stong ba mtsham ma myed cing kyi spong/ gas// bsams pa'i sa 'chi 'phos dang ni skye ba song / skyes pa byed cing kyi/ nyang
129a7(1): gnas 'chi 'pho byed// de dag don tu myi'i spyod pa zhu/ nyam thos rang rgyal skye bo gzhan dag gis// rtogs par dka' zhing zab mo bzho pa dkal la// skye bo kun gyis yid rnams skul pa'i// chos kyi gtam ni bde 'a gshegs la u/ 
129a8(1): legs par byas pa rdzogs pa'i chos la dka'o// chos la chos myed 'dzin pa nyis las grol/ rtag tu mnyam ma zhag mchog gi chos la dgal// sems dang nam mkha' tshungs pa'i don tu 'u// gab dag sangs rgyas rigs rnaMs chos yang
129a9(1): rtag tu sangs rgyas stod pa kun myed blo// grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum tu thos/ 9/ yon tan rgya mtsho de phyir 'di zhu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ 
129a10(1): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang tshungs pa rnams lags// tshul khrims nam kha dang tshungs pa dang / bzod pa nam mkha' dang tshungs pa dang nga brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bsam gtan
129b1(1): la tshungs pa dang / shes banas pa la'ang rungs pa dang / bas rnams rnamamapa' dang srungs pa dang / legs rnam ma las zungs pa rnam sa lags/ blas rgyas kyis gan ba'i sangs rgyas des su ngas pa sa / 
129b2(1): chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / phyi bral ba rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa dang skye bral ba rnams lags/ bya ngan
129b3(1): las 'das pa dang mnyam pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa yang spyod de// sems can thams cad kyi saspyod pa'i mtshan dang chog shes pa rnams lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos makor mchog gi mdzod 'dzind pa dang / 
129b4(1): mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs pang sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang / thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas sems can yongs su smind par 'gred
129b5(1): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i slad du// 'tshal bzhin tu yang rab tu spyod pa rnams lags la/ mngon pa ra shes pa las myi nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang bgyid pa rnams lags
129b6(1): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu rtogs par dka' ba'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la zhugs pa rnams lags// rten cing 'dre/ la par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas so// mtha' gnyis su lta
129b7(1): pa thams cad dang bral ba rnams lags// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas gtab pas de bzhin nyid dbyer myed pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la rab tu zhugs shing chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dgra bar
129b8(1): zhol ba rnams lags/ bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing myi phyed de/ thegad pa chen po 'di legs par gnas shing myi g.yol ba rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongs su dag pa rnams lags// gzungs thob pa
129b9(1): rtag tu byi ching bar 'amyod pa rnams lags / slobs pa thogs pa byed cing rgyan gyi tshad 'a rtag tu sa ngas rgyas kyi byidan kyis rlabs kyis / byed kyis mangs pa rnams sags / sme ba dang mi bo' dang byung ba rnams sa dbang thos / 
129b10(1): rnam /  nasem pas sus byi sa sa mam / ba mas kyi tshogs par bye shi/ e ma yo bya bams mas/ 
130a1(1): bya ma 'byung yang chang/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la gnyer gnas pa rnams lags/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzinang thob cing sems can thams cad kyi sems dpa myong ba la chags pa rnams lags
130a2(1): chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / nam mkha' la drung ngamar u bu'i sems dang / ldang pa rnams lags/ srog dang kyang pani tshul ges ya dang / su na bya dang bral 'di snang ba dang tho pa rnams lags/ gzhan kyi dril
130a3(1): bye 'jog cing rang byung gi ye shes shi nad tu rtogs pa rnams lags/ myur tu theg pa tha chen po la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di thob par 'gyur lags// de skad ces gsolang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpal so/ 
130a4(1): dpa' chen po nam mkha' 'jod la 'di skad ces bka' saHla to// skyes bu dam pa khyod/ legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di dri bar sems pa legs so// 'di lta ste/ dakhyod ni sems can thams cad
130a5(1): kyi rgya myom mas rgyab bya'i bzhes gnyes/ sangs rgyas pakyi chos thams cang la snang ba thob pa// byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i ko na bgos pa/ 'brang ba las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas
130a6(1): rtag tu chos tshol bas bye roms pa/ ye shes kyi mtshon ma dang / brgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ rtag tu rgyus kyi chang bar sems can gyi ngos la bcor pa/ 'jig rten gyi/ nya
130a7(1): chos brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa/ nam mkha' dang tshungs pa'i sems kyis thams cad khyend pa'i ye shes yang dag par sgrub la sgrubs pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi yon tan rnams kyi mtha' rtogs par sla ba ma yin no/ 
130a8(1): de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod khregs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yon tan 'di rnams dang gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so// 
130a9(1): zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpal nam mkha' mdzod bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bkalas ma yang to// rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa ram ma
130a10(1): dang tshungs ta ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste bdag rnam par dag pas sems cad rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / sems cad rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa rnas par dag pas sngo ga mthang ba ni
130b1(1): ngas sbyid pa de sbyin te/ brgyad gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nge 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyis/ rgyun rnam par dag par sbyin pa de spyis/ lta ba rnam par dag 'ang sbyin pa de sbyin/ mtsham sa dam par dag par sbyin pa de skyes/ dam par spyir du
130b2(1): kha byi re bar rnam par dag par spyod pa de byis/ nam mkha' dang tshungs pa'i sems rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyi/ rnam par dag pa brgyad po de dag gi sgonas sbyin pa de spyi mo/ ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' byed pa de bzhin du sems mtha' byed
130b3(1): par bya ste sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che zhing sgribs pa byed pa de bzhin du byang chub tu spos ste sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la gzugs byed pa de bzhin du gzugs thams cad la sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar rnam
130b4(1): 'alal la tshor ba myed pa de bzhin du tshor ba thams cad dang bral bar sbyin / ba de spyis/ ji ltar nam mkha' 'du shes myed pa de bzhin du 'du shes thams cad kyi btung ba skyed par sbyis pa de sbyin/ ji ltar ram mkha' zhum
130b5(1): ma byas pa de bzhin du 'dus byas thams cad myed par sbyin pa de sbyis ji lta nam mkha' mtshar nyid rnam par rig pa myed pa de bzhin du rnas par shes pa myi gnas par sbyid pa de sbyis/ pi u ba rab pa kham
130b6(1): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la khyab pa de bzhin tu/ sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par sbyin pa sprin/ ji ltar nam mkha' myi zad pa de bzhin du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs myi zad par sde 'di sbyin pa de sprin
130b7(1): ji ltar nam mkha' la mun pa myed pa de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi sum pa skyed par sbyis pa de sbyis/ ji ltar nam mkha' rtag par rab tu snang ba de bzhin du sems kyi rang bzhini yongs su dag pang sbyin pa de sbyis/ ri
130b8(1): nam mkha' sems cas thams cad kyis// go skabs 'byed pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad nye bar 'jo bar sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' le ra'i ba myed cipa de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad yid la byed pa thams cad dang bral bA
131a1(1): ma'i mtshan nyid rnam pa dag par byang chub sems dpa' smin pa de sbyin te/ rigs pa kyi bu ga de ga bur sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de ni shes rab kyi ye shes pas kyise ni zhesebs pas thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams can po na
131a2(1): su 'dos zhing thabs kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad myi gtong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de lta bur gtod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar gtong ba'i sems ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkhal dang tshungs pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dashA
131a3(1): sems dpa' chen po lag na mar me zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'di 'dra ba
131a4(1): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' mas med par/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gapa dag pa byed pa ste/ rnam pa rnas yang dag pa sems cad kyi rnam pa ste/ sems ca nam khang dag pa chob kyi rnam la se
131a5(1): chos rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi rnam pa ste/ ye ges rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi rnam pa ste/ shes rab rnam par dag pa sems rnam pa dang / sa// sems rnam par dag pa 'jig rten rnam pa ste/ 'jig rten rnam 'a / 
131a6(1): gzugs byed pa gzugs su sonang pa dang gyi sto rang ba'i ye shes de ba dag pa// mum pa byed cing sus pa rab tu snang bar byed pa// maH ma phams n+ya d+ha bya bya shig pa mtshan sa byed pa lem thar phyi rang pa'i ye shes/ 1na
131a7(1): rnam par dag pa/ phyi mang pa'i bzod pa dang ldas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i khu stan ba thob pa/ sems bcad cing byang chub sems dpa'i nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa/ phyir myi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas
131a8(1): gtab ci bdab bskur ba thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par zhugs 'ashis mnyam pa nyid gyis mnyam par spyod pa/ legs par 'apyod pa la spyad pa/ sems can thams cad kyis spong ba'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes
131a9(1): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dgra gi myongs yul te/ skyes bu ngas pa de dang de dag ni sgra de lta bu'i sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// stand pa 'di bshad pa ma/ byang chub sems dpal khri drug stong ram mkhal dang rmongs pa'i
131a10(1): sbyis pa la bzod pa/ skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// / dag pa'i sems kyis rtag tu sbyin pa skyes// byang chub phyir te na pa spyid yod phyi 'dod/ rag la 'i bar bu ras rjes su
131b1(1): gdung byed de// chab tu thom nas rtag tu sbyin pa byed// mkhas pas chos rnams sgra 'drang shes ras su// yus dang srog pa 'ang chags par bye 'gyung zhing // de dag la ni rnams kyang 'dig 'byed// sesang des bas
131b2(1): pa byang chub nges// thams cad btang yang byi 'gar myi 'gyur zhing // de la zhus pa myed cing kong pa myed// de'i yis nam mkha' mtshungs par chos rnams snyoms/ de bar dkal bar phyi 'gyur zhum pa 'ab byed// bdag gi rang ba'i
131b3(1): snga ngas rnam par dag/ byang chub rnam par dag pas sbyin pa skyes// pi ni sems kyi rgyud la myi chags pang// spros pa byed par sbyin pa rab tu sbyid// sems mnyam yid kyang mnyam pas kun tu sbyin pa gtog/ rab 'dri
131b4(1): tha ma gsum yang myed par sbyin// bsam pa yongs su dag ci dri ma myed pa yis// thams cad gtong yang rnam par smi nang phyi 'dod// lus dang tshe ni myi rtag sgyu ma 'dra// long spyod rmi lam klog bzhin snying po byed// 'jig rten kun
131b5(1): kha snying rje rtse bskyed nas// 'jig rten chos kyis ma 'gos sbyin pa spyi na// nyon mongs dag phyir bdag gi nor kun gtong // rgyal ba'i tshig gi gnas su 'gyur snyam ste// bdud rnams kyis kyi ni bdag la glags
131b6(1): byi 'asnyed// de ltar rtags nas thams cad gtong ba yin// stobs bcus sbyin pa ma pa yin zhes gsungs// de la rab tu gnas nas tshul khrims ldan// tshul khrims yon tan gnas nas bsam gtan
131b7(1): rnyed// bsam gtan ma chags shes rab rdzogs par byed// sbyin pa la dang ni rtul bas sems rab 'tshim// nyon mongs rnams kyang tshig nas phyir myi skye// sbyin pa bdag dang gzhan la phan gsungs// ba phan dang
131b8(1): bde ba 'dus byas spyir bas bkru// sprin gtong nyon mongs spong zhing dge ba'i phyir// des na 'dzin pa la chags myi 'gyur ro// pha rol ston spongs phyir ni myi gtong ste// bdag blo rnam pa dag byang chub phyir gtong / 
131b9(1): ji lta ji ltar pa zhum sems kyis gtong// hri lha 'i ga byang chub yos tam mthong // de lta de ltar skyes mo brgya 'chi ba byed// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ras ma hA
131b10(1): mdzod la dka' saH khang pa/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims nam mkha' dang tshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na na 'di lta se/ gzugs rnyan lta bu'i lngas
132a1(1): mnyam pa nyid dang bras cha lta bu'i sgra mnyam pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems mnyam pa nyid dang / nam mala' lta bu'i blo mnyam pa nyid de/ snyigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul/ 
132a2(1): khrims dam mkha' dang tshungs pa yimo// rigs kyi bu brgyang po 'di dag mi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ste/ brgyad zhi ba zhe na 'di lta ste/ sems can rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems da
132a3(1): myi bral ba dang / zad mar gyu rad pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir nyam thos dang rab sangs rgyas kyi sems myed pa dang / dam bcas pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir srab pa thams cad kyi 'dod pa dang / spong lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir skye ba thams cad
132a4(1): tu myi 'jug pa dang / mngon par tu myi byed pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir myi lhod pa dang / mtsham ma yongs su dag pa'i phyir byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / nyon mongs pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir kun nas gdung ba myed pa dang / byang chub
132a5(1): yongs su dag pa'i phyir spyon las/ yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ mdo bar 'du gyi byed pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir myi smos pa dang / re/ nas kyi bu brgyad pa de dag mi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims yongs
132a6(1): su dag pa'o// gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni mam me khal dag pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang dag pa'o// rnam ma khangadri ma byed pa ste tshul khrims de la 'dris byed pa'o// ram mkha' 'i bste/ 
132a7(1): tshul khrims de yang zhi pa'o// ram mkha' byi bzong ba ste/ tshul khrims de yang myi mthol ba'o// rim mkhal gyi dma' ba ste tshul khrims de yang byi ngamal ba'o// nam mkha' gzung du byed pa ste tshul khrims de yang gzung du myed
132a8(1): ba'o// rab mkha' gnas byed pa me/ tshul khrims de yang garab byed pa'o// das la khal skyed pa ma/ yin te / tshul khrims de yang byed pa ma yin no// nam mkha' rtag pa ste/ tshul khrim pa de yang rtag 'a'o// rab mkha' phyi bang
132a9(1): pa ste tshul khrim mo myi zas 'o/ ma nas mkha' mtshan me myed pa ste/ tshul khrims mu tshan ma myed pa'o// nam mkha' rgyu ba myed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang rgyu ba myed pa'o// nam mkha' spros pa myed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang smras
132a10(1): kha byed pa'o// nam mkha' zag pa myed pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang zag pa myed pa'o// nam mkha' 'dus ma byas pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang 'dus ma byas pa'o// nam mkha' sa byi b+ha ste/ tshul khrims de ya mA la tsur+ya myi 'argya
132b1(1): rnams tha rnab par gyi rtog pa ste/ sula'is de sa das pa kyi ga sabs mams cad du 'ongs ste/ sa khrims de'ang mams ra du 'ong ba'o// ma mas kyi ro kyi rtsed / sa sno
132b2(1): kyi chod kyi byed pa'o// chanam mkha' tshungs par spyod pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang tshungs par spyod pa'o// nam mkhamanas rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin te/ tshul khrims de yang rang bzhin gyis kun ras
132b3(1): nyon mongs pa can ma yin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims nam mkha' dang tshugs pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// 
132b4(1): sems zhi tshul khrims dri byed srung zhing / gdung ba myed/ lus dang sems kyang rnam dka/ ngag yid thams cad sngams// mkhas pa rtag tun pa'i tshul khrims dregs myi snyoms// blo 'chang sems la myi gnas byang chub
132b5(1): sos la stonang // khas kab ma byas ma gsams de bzhin ma brtags te// de ni dmar sngo ser byin kha dog gzugs myi gnas/ da/ gzugs byed myi bded byi g.yol dper lnga bzhis// tshul khribs lta ba'i
132b6(1): thar da byed byang chub cha pa'i gzhi la// gang su dasbyangs pa mgon gnas 'dod nyung chog shes pa// yo byad spangs shing bsam gtan dben tshogs sems spongs pa/ tshul khrims de'i gnas des sems rkang tha ded pa'i rtend
132b7(1): de phyir tshul khrims brgyand pa lam de thams cad bsgrub// g.yo ba rlom sems kun bral lta ba'i nyon mongs gcod// nas mkhal tshungs mnyam byams pas khyab cings pa rang 'dzi nang spyod// byang chub phyir nges kyi gtong byang chub
132b8(1): kun gyi gtog// gang mkhas chos shes de 'dra byab khrims pa rol phyin// rigs kyi bu de la ji ska ma byang chub sems das pa bzod pa ram mkha' dang tshungs pa yid sbe de/ rigs kyi bu chos pa'i rang snang na byang chub mos
132b9(1): dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang tshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste tshig nam mkha' dang tshungs pa'i phyir gshel yang slar phyi gshel pa dang / lus nam mkha' dang tshungs pa'i phyir bdes kyang spang byi 'ardeg pa dang
133a1(1): sems ca ras mkha' dang tshungs pa'i phyir smos kyang slar gyi spyo ba dang / bsam pa nam mkha' dang tshungs pa'i phyir khros kyang srang myi khros pa de/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldangs/ byang chub sems da'adzin
133a2(1): bzod pa nam mkha' dang tshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa nam mkhal dang tshungs pa yongs su dag pa 'di brgyad de/ brkyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' la zhe 'bras pa myed de/ sos
133a3(1): ca thams cad la zhe 'gras pa byed pa'i bzod pa yongs su dga' dang / nam mkha' la rjes su chags pa myed de/ rnyed pa rang bkur sti la rjes su chags pa myed pa 'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' si mnyam par spyod pa ste
133a4(1): sos car thams cang sa sems mnyam pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nas ma la bsis sngangs nyams pa ste/ lus dang sems zad bag nyams pa byed pa'i yongs su dag pa dang / ram mkhal ni bag la nyel thams cad spangs pas
133a5(1): bag la nyal byed pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' mi yid dang dmyigs pa byed pa ste/ yid dang dmyigs pa myed pa'i 'thod pa yongs su dag pa dang / ram mkha' ni ma skyes ma 'byung ba leste/ ma skyes ma la
133a6(1): ba'i 'bod la can gyi 'thod pa yongs su dag pa dang / ras mkha' nig thugs dang gzugs byed pa thams cad la khyab pa ste/ byams pas rgya la ba'i 'azod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu brgyad be de dag ni byang chub/ 6tra
133a7(1): sems dpal rnams kyi mthong pa yongs su dag pa nam mkha' dngab tshungs pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa la rnams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzong ba ni 'di brgyad de// brgyad gang 'i sa 'di lta ste/ spong ba nyid la gathod kyang
133a8(1): lta ba zhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa la bzod kyang mtshan pa gseld pa ma yin pa dang / spo dang pa myed pa la bzod kyang byang chub tu smond pa myed pa ma yin pa dang / mngon par 'du myi byed pa la bzod kyang
133a9(1): 'dus byas rnam par bzhag pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / skye ba myed pa la bzod kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid kyis ma yin pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa la bzod kyang skye ba dang gnas pa ma yin pa dang / sems can myed pa la bzod
