133b1(1): 'a'ong pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dag bdag la 'ashe ba dang yang ba'ong ngo snyam pa de sri yid 'ayin pa'i 'azod pa zhe/ 'din nam pakhal dang tshungs pa'i bzod pas yin no// 'di dag gshe ba bdag gis 'azod 'ar bya'o// sgrub pa de'i

136b4(1): pa yang yod skyed la// mnyam pa nyid pa ces bya ba'i mtshan myed de// mnyam nyid de la keng dkarab gnas pa// de dag rtag rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab nam mkhal
136b5(1): tsam thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / ye shes rnam pa dag sa narnam par shes pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pas/ bsam ladang sems cad dang srog dang gang zag dam
136b6(1): par deg par 'jug pa dang / don rnam par dag pas/ yi ge thams cad rnam par dag par rab tu rtogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan ma// byang chub sems dpa' shes rab nam mkhal dang tshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sem
136b7(1): dpa' rnams kyi nyes rab yongs su dag pa ni 'di brgyad de// brgyad ga she gas/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos 'ams cad yang dag 'ang sgrub kyang / rtag 'ang lta ba bye spyod pa dang / bye dge ba'i chos 'ams cad spong 'ang bco na 'grul chom pa cang ba na
136b8(1): ston la/ kye rtag pa dang sug sngal ba dang bdag byed pa dang / zhi ba nyid tu ngom po yang dag pa reg su phyi ma 'o sa dang / rnams dang bya ba sa 'dug pa rab tu stonod kyang las byed byam rnam par sbyir pa byed pa las kyang kyi gamam 'a
137a1(1): spros pa myed pa'i chos shes pa la gnas pa yin kyang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba nges par stand pa rab tu stond pa dang / chos thams cad phyi snang ba rab tu ste da pa yin kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rngam par
137a2(1): byang ba yang sems can rnams la rab tu stodod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa'o// yang shes rab ces bya ba 'di ri rnam par rtog pa kun nas 'bar ba byed pa'i phyir
137a3(1): nye bar zhi ba'i tshig go// rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i 'di ni myi 'gyur ba'i tshig go// gnas myed pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par myi rtog pa'i tshig go// yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba'i phyir 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig no/ 
137a4(1): 'gyur ba ma mchis pa'i phyir 'di ni bdes pa'i tshig go// ma rung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di ni yang dag pa'i tshig go// bcings pa yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir 'di ni yid rdo ba'i tshig go// 'phags pa'i yon tan gyi phyir 'di mi ngog
137a5(1): ba'i tshig go// shi nang tu rtags pa'i phyir 'di ni nges par byed pa'i tshig go// brjod du myed pa'i phyir 'di ni don kyi tshig go// khyad par myed pa'i phyir 'di ni tshungs pa'i tshig go// myi gshegs pa'i phyir 'di ni
137a6(1): nyon mongs pa'i byed pa'i phyir 'di'i rnam par dgragro// snang ba phyi dbyigs pa'i phyir 'di ni mun pa byed pa'i tshig go// spro btags pa skyed pa'i phyir 'didi gnyis su phyed pa'i tshig no// ginang dung bye nang ba'i phyi par byad pa
137a7(1): tshig go// ge'adus ma byas kyi phyir 'di ni byi zad pa'i tshig go// sbyar ba byed pa'i phyir 'di ni 'dus ma byas pa'i tshig go// shin thungs par dag pa'i phyir rje ni nam mkha'i tshig ko// bsgribs pa'i phyir 'di ni dam ma kha'i tshig go// 
137a8(1): gnas pa'i gnas kyi phyir/ 'di mi kun nas gsal byed kyi tshig go// ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir 'di ni phyi dmyigs pa'i tshig go// dam par shes pa dang ye shes gnyis su myed pa'i phyis 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig go// banyer po skyed pa
137a9(1): khyi 'di ni kyi rmi ma'i bye gos mdod bdas grus pa'i bye di ni lus byed pa cos so// ku tu tog pa'i lus sngas kyi phyir 'di 'i yongs su zhes pa'i mig go// srid pa'i bags nya' yang dag pa com pa'i phyir 'dzi bur 'ashud
137b1(1): ma tu sa byas sa pa sa so/  byed sa pa'i byang san pa pa/ rdzogs pa sa sa rgyas bas pa byeg ma pa
137b2(1): rab tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir 'di ni chos kyi tshig ste/ gang de lta bu'i tshig la 'jug pa'i ye shes snang ba gzhan gyi dring la myi 'jog pa'i 'di ni shes rab ces bya'o// gang nges par bstand pa thams cad kha nam mkhal dang tshungs
137b3(1): pabapar bstand pa'i rjes su 'gro ste/ rjes su 'gro bas chos chung du la yang myi rtogapa/ rnam par myi rtog pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa nam mkha' dang tshungs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
137b4(1): de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// shes rab lta dang sum pa nyon mongs gcod// rtag tu bag chags nyos yongs rab sam lang cing // rgyu dang rkyer dang byed pa nges par stodzod // mtha' rnams thams cad yongs su gconan
137b5(1): khyed// bdag dang sems can la yang myi gnas shing // gang lag srog la yang rtag tu gnas pa skyed// dngos dang dngos myed gnyis la/ sa the dad byed de// shes rab pha rolang 'gro ba rab tu bstand// shes rab bdud lda
137b6(1): rgyal te nyon mongs byed// shes rab chu bo las bskal rab tu bsnol// shes rab ye shes byed cing rnam par spyod// shes rab tha ba bde ba'i mchog kyang ston // shes rab kyis ni bsgribs pa'i rtsa ba spyod/ 
137b7(1): phung po khams ni yongs su shes rab mtshand // mtshan dang mtshan bzhi mtshungs mtshan grol byed pa// shes rab thob pa snying pa gsum na mdzes// yongs su dag spyod shes rab ces bya ste// 'jig rten thams cad kyis ni myi
137b8(1): gos baspyod// sbyang bar myong ba rab tu rtogs par spyod// shes rab dag pa'i phyig ni rnam par mdzes// phyig lnga dag ni yongs su dag byed cing // dbang po lnga ni rab tu snang bar byed// 'gro ba ldan pas rab tu gcod 'ang byed/ 
137b9(1): phung po lnga ni zad phyir mchos ston to// pha rold tshu rol rtag tu myi gnas shing // chos kyi dbyings las gnas nas shi nang tu gnas// 'ab snang dang ni tshungs mnyam 'dra ba ste// sangs rgyas ye shes rjes su mthus zhing grags// 
137b10(1): rnyed dang ma rnyed gnyi ga mtha' las grol// dbus la rtog pa kun rtog myi rtog pa// gang nas 'phags pa thams cad song ba'i// 'chi ba myed pa'i lam du 'jug pa stonang // sdug sngal shes shing de bzhin sred pa spangs/ 
138a1(1): mas nam sa ston cing 'gag pa 'ang rab tu 'chad// 'der ba shes par shes rab 'di 'drag ste// des ni sdod kyi mtha' yang rab tu bcad// zhing rnam sa blang zhing tshungs zhing pa yis// chos dmas thams cad chos
138a2(1): batshungs rab tud byed// sems bsamabs cad zadag byed sems par btsungs// shes rab blo 'asud pas ni 'di shes so// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod rabs ram gakhas rab bzungs pa gang zhes
138a3(1): rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos min po mkha' dang tshungs te/ de dag gi byang chub kyi sems kyis sa bon de yang ram mkha' rab mtshungs so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bso ba rnams mi snyed mngon par 'du bya ba/ mdod pas su
138a4(1): byed pa de yang byang chub kyi sems dang byi bral te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsasags pa de dag kyang thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du sngo bar byed cing / de dag thams cad kyis kyang ram mkhal dang mtshungs par tshad byed par rab tu gnas so// des bya du
138a5(1): sems rapas 'di ltar ras mkha ched byed pa'i phying bdag gis bsod nams chad skye pa'i mdong bar 'du bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe sa/ tshad myed par brtsams pas/ tshad byed pa'i ngo brel ba yin te

138a7(1): mtshan dang dpe la byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pas/ lus kyi brgyan tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam khang dag par dag pas ga gi brgya dad cad byed pa
138a8(1): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su 'jug pas/ sems kyi brgyan tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / spyod pa'i ye shes dang spyod las tshad smras/ sems can yongs su smyidad par bya ba tshar myed
138a9(1): pa yongs su rdzogs par bye ba dang / rnam pa tshad byed pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa tshad myed pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bsod nams dang sems nges par rtog pa dang / spyod pa myong bas sangs rgyas kyi spyod la ma tsha

139b5(1): 'chag pa dang / 'dus pa dang nyal ba dang / 'gro ba dang 'ong ba dang smra ba dang / myi smra bar yang sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par myi byed do// / de mngon par chags pas dra pa 'ang dran par myi byed do// de dran pa yid la myi byed pas

139b7(1): ba gang yang myed do// chos shes bya ba ni kun gzhi myed pa'o// kaphel chos gang la spyod pa de dag la chos rjes su dras pa gang yang byed do// chos shes bya ba de ni nye 'ba'i bang zhi ba ste/ gang sems rang yid 'bar bar byed pa de dag pa co ba rjes su

140a1(1): sa/ kyang chu cesas pa yang ga par rjon sa pa'i 'as rgya sa rnams kyis mngon pa rtogs pa'o// se sang mnyam 'ang banag pa gas pa mams cas kyinas pang thos ha ste/ phe la nos ga sa myong ba byed pa de ni mas ba kyis sha
140a2(1): ba'i chos 'a yongs su dran pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dram pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun zhes bya ba de ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ de mngon par 'du byed pa rjes su dran par myi nus so// kag ma lu

140a7(1): gang la sems kyis nam 'or rig pa byed pa deni dam par rig pa spyad pa de'ini rnam par shes pa kyi gnas pa'o// rnam par shes pa de byi grangs pa de ni 'das rgyas kyis gdang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o// gang yang byang chub sems kyi
140a8(1): ngas de'i thathams cad sa bye dang bar pos pa ste/ gang bams cad ma byed du pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid do// gang gnyam pa nyengs grangs pa ni rab tu sde 'ing byang chub tu yang sol ste/ de res su drang sa chom gang yang rjes
140a9(1): drang ba byed do// de ci'i phyir zhes/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos dang chos ma yin pa gnyis dang ldan pa ma yin te/ gang 'di gnyis su byed pa 'di la yid la byed pa ji yang byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos shes pa kha rab tu sbyor ba'i
140a10(1): byang chum gos dbu 'a ni sangs rgyas kyis gzung ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa gapa zhe sa/ tshul khrims shes bya ba 'dus ma byas pa ste bag pa myed pa spon las byed pa/ khrur gyis grub pa// tus zhugs grub pa chul zhugs thams ca
140b1(1): yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// ting nge 'dzind kyi gnas te/ sems kyi dbyigs pa'i gnas ma yin no// shes rab kyi rtsa ba ste spros pa'i rtsa ba ma yin no// ta rnam par grol ba'i rgyu mthun pa ste/ 
140b2(1): gzugs snang ba ma yin no// nyon mongs pa zhi ba ste so so rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// bde ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing gnyen pos bskyed pa ma yin te/ gang de lta bu'i tshul khrims rjes su dran zhing drang ba la rnyog pa myed pa de ni
140b3(1): rigs kyi bu sangs kyis gdang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sras kyis gnang ba'i khwa rjes su dran pa gang zhe sa/ lha'i ris gnyis su rjes su dran par bya ste/ gnyis ka zhes/ gnas
140b4(1): gsung ma'i ris kyi lha dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpal dkal ldan gnas na 'khod pa rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpa' gnas gtsang ma'i dris kyi lha rnams rjes su dran no// yang skye ba cig gis thogs pa'i bya
140b5(1): chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnas na gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni sme bo wA bu bcus rjes su dras te/ bcu'i gang zhen pa rol tu phyind pa thams cad kyi nang ma shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa spyi bor gyu rang pa dang / mngon par/ k+Shath+ya tra
140b6(1): shes pa thams cad kyi nang na myi nyams pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sa thams cad kyi nang nas dbang skur ba'i sa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi nang na dbang spya du yang dgad pa'i lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin / 
140b7(1): myi nyams pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i nang na don dang spobs pas rgyus myi 'chad pa dang / shes pa thams cad kyi nang na chags pa myed pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dngang / dbang po thams cad kyi nang mar ba 'brib tham la 'jug pa shes yang / 
140b8(1): stobs dang myi 'jigs pa la snang ba'i ye shes su 'gro ba dang / spyan thams cad kyi nang na sangs rgyas kyi spyan kun tu gzigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'di dag gi khag zil du song ba ltar 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po las
140b9(1): 'dug nas/ sems kyi skad gcig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes spyi bo'i chos rnam pa bcu po de dag gis rjes su dran no// de'i dran pa de ni lta bas ma 'khrugs/ bka la nyal dang / kun nas
140b10(1): ldang bas ma khrugs/ yid la phyed pas ma 'khrugs/ spobs pas ma 'khrugs pa ste/ de lta bu'i dran pa rnyog pa myed pas lha rje su dran pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji

141a8(1): macan nyid dam pa/ 'dod chags kyi mtshan nyid dam/ zhe sdim gi mtshan nyid dang / gti mug gi mtsha nyid de/ skal 'a mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid de/ thos can dmyal ba'i mtshan nyid de// dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi mtshan nyid de// ga gi ro'i 'dzin rten gyi mam pa nyid dang/ 
141b1(1): su'i mtshan nyid de/ phyi'i mtshan nyid dam /  nyan thos kyi nges par gyu pa'i mtshar nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par gyudang pa'i mtshad nyid dam / sangs rgyas kyi nges par gyur pa 'a'imams nyid dam / ring po'i skyil mtshan nyid dag / sam ma'i rgyu'i 'chang/

145a2(1): rim gang rnam pa shes pa'i spyod yul de dag chos dam par 'jog pa byed do// gang nga rnam par shes pa sa mye gnas pa 'dag ni chos rnam par 'ayog pagyi byed/ de dag de bzhi gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas tubar ded da de 'i/ 
145a3(1): nyid dbyer par myi byed do// de la de bzhin nyid mtha' snyad pa gang zhe na/ gang dag tha ma dang 'bring dang rab kyi chos rnams su rnam par rtog pa'o// gang dag chos thams cad la myi rtog cing rnam par phyi rtog pa de dag ni de bzhin nyid tha dang tu
145a4(1): myi byed do// yang ji snyed mang por rtags rnam par rtags kyang de bzhin nyid dbye bar myi nus te/ dper ma sems can thams cad ni nam mkha' la rnam pa de rgyu yang nam mkha'i khams mi 'dres par myi byed do// de bzhin du sems can thams cad
145a5(1): de bzhin nyid la rnam par rgyu yang de bzhin nyid ni 'dres par myi byed do// gang 'dir de lta bu'i chos rnaMs shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas tab pa yin te/ de bzhin nyid kyang 'dre ba pad+ma byed
145a6(1): gis kyi de sa mi dang pa/ byang chub ses pa sa cos kyi sa la us dging chos kyi dbyings bams cad sa 'ag pang naba'i med/ kyi b+h+ring shes bya'i dus pamasaca na ##
145a7(1): 'dod chags 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings so// yang dag par sgrubs pa myed pa'i phyir ba skyes pa'i dbyings so// ma 'byung ba'i phyir gyi 'gog pa'i dbyings so// 'gro ba byed pa'i phyi byi 'gro la'i dbyings so// na khad ba myed pa'i phyir
145a8(1): 'ong ba byed pa'i dbyings so// 'byung ba byed pa'i phyir gnas byed pa'i dbyings so// dus gsum mnyam pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin gyi dbyings so// / bzod mas nas pade dag pa'i phyir bdag gi dbyings po 'don ngas pa yis 'a'i gang 'ag byed pa'i darkye ba
145a9(1): gnas byed pa'i phyir rnam par rig pa byed pa'i dbyings so// 'dre ba myed pa'i phyir kun gzhi byed pa'i dbyings so// nges par gyu dang ba'i phyir skye ba myed pa'i dbyings so// rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings so// gnyer po byed pa'i phyir
145a10(1): byang ngar las 'das pa'i dbyings ste/ 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya'o// / rigs kyi bu chos thams cad de ltar zhugs pas de la byang chub sems dpas de ltang chos kyi phyog la zhugs pa kapa mi smra ba dang / brjod pa dang / sto du pa de nas
145b1(1): cang mi chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol pa nyid do// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs pa de 'dod chags kyi khams dang chos kyi dbyings de dag gnyis su byed pa rab tu shes song / de ci'i phyir zhe sa/ 'dod chags ni chos kyi dbyings kyi byin
145b2(1): kyang sa pazhidabad do// zhe sdang gi mas dang chos kyi dbyings de dag de nyis su byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de gang ni chob kyi dbyis kyi rang banyid cad do// ti mug gi khalas dang chos kyi dbyeng sa redag de gnyis su byed de/ de mi'i byeng de
145b3(1): ti mug ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin par ro// nyor mongs pa'i khams dang chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can ma/ 'dod pa'i khams dang chos kyi dbyings re ngan
145b4(1): ni gnyis su byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin cad no// gzugs kyi khams dang chos kyi dbyings su de dag ni gnyis su byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyi khams ci chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhim ca
145b5(1): byed de/ de ge phyi ba'is/ byin gi 'ams mi smos kyi dbyings kyi rang ye dacan do// gzugs kyi khams dang chos kyi dbying sa de dag gnyis su byed de/ de phyi'i phyir zhen/ gzugs ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang badzi cang ngo ro// byed de
145b6(1): nam par shes pa'i khams dang / thos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhis can no// yid kyi bar gyi khams dang chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe
145b7(1): yid kyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// phung po'o
145b8(1): khams dang chom kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phung po'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// sa'i khams dang chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis
145b9(1): su myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa dang chu dang mye dang drung ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dbying nga banyid cam so / chos kyi phung po brgyad dri ba ni gong dang / myong ba brgya bri ba ni gsongs/ chos thams cad kyi'ang dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su byed do// 
146a1(1): de ci'i phyir zhes chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la zhugs pa de ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag pa g.yol ba'i phyis chos shes lnga
146a2(1): rab tu shes pa yis te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la mi ltu sa/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing phyi byed de/ zhig pa che tsho
146a3(1): 'di la legs par gnas shing myi g.yo' ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra ba zhing byi phyed pa bcu gnyis na lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis myi phyed pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta le
146a4(1): byang chub kyi sems myi phyed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas spong bas myi phyed pa dang / sbyin pa myi phyed pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab myi phyed pa dang / byams pa chen po
146a5(1): dang / snying rje chen po myi byed pa dang / slu ba'i dngos po myi byed pa dang / seMs can yongs su smind par byed pa myi byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa myi phyed pa dang / 'khor bas yongs su byi spro ba myi byed pa dang / dge ba'i
146a6(1): tha bas kyi ngoms pa gyi byed pa dang / mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang ba'i phyir gtan pa skyed pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa myi byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos/ yongs su gzung ba'i phyir lus dang srog 'dor ba myi byed pa dang / sems cad
146a7(1): gzhan dang gang ga gzhan gyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bsngo ba myi byed pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa/ byi phyed pa de rigs kyi bu gang gi rtse/ byang chub sems dpal chos 'dis bu 'di ngag yas
146a8(1): spyi phyed pa de'i tshe/ bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing myi phyed pa yin no// 'di lta ste dpeng dper ma nor bu rin po che thams cad dbyigs kyang bdag nyid ni myi dbyigs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje khang sra zhing myi phyed pa
146a9(1): yang sems cad thams cad kyi bka la nyal ba dang / nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba dang / zhu bar gyur dra pa las// se lad kyang bdag nyid ni theg pa chen po 'di las kyi phyed do// rigs kyi bu de skad sa byang chub sems dpal bsas la
146a10(1): de ltang ma zhing kyi byed de/ theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing phyi g.yol ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar ma byang chub sems rapa' ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su dag pas rang gi yul yongs su dga' yid zhes/ mangs
146a11(1): rgyas kyi yul zhes bya ba ni dang / yul ma yin pa/ yul myed pa/ yul thams cad yongs su dag pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su dag pas/ rang gi yul yongs su spyod ste
146b1(1): de 'di snyam du byig gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul ni myig gi yul
146b2(1): gang yang ga byed do// rna ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yu.u ni su dang yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir les sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul kha ni na
146b3(1): ba'i yul gang yang skyed do// sA'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul suni su dang / yang nyed pa 'am ring ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ 
146b4(1): dben pa'i yul la ni snga'i yul gang yang byed do// lce'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul si su dang yang nye ba 'am ring bya ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dbes 'i u sa
146b5(1): byir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni lce'i yul gang yang myed do// lus kyi yul/ ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang ya panye ba 'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe sa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul
146b6(1): ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni lus kyi yul ba/ nga yang myed do// yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma dzi rlo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
146b7(1): sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni yid kyi yul gang yang myed do// phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcwa
146b8(1): gnyis pa la de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul dben pa nyid kyis yul thams cad dben par 'jug go// rang gi zhing yongs su dag par sangs rgyas kyi zhing la zhugs pa de ni chos gzangs
146b9(1): dbang po drug pa snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul dben pas 'jug go// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul chags pa myed cang thogs pa myed pa de bzhin du/ de yul zhes cad la yang myi chags myi thogs te/ 
146b10(1): rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub seMs dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul la rjes su zhugs shing rang gi yul yongs su dag pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub seMs dpa' gzungs thob pa rtag tu myi rjed par spyod pa yI zhem
147a1(1): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs yongs su spang ba byas pas gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ de la gzungs yongs su spyad pa byed pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sum bcu ma gnyis po 'di dag ni gzungs
147a2(1): yongs su spang ba byed pa ste/ gsum bcu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos don tu gnyed pa dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos kun dga' la mos pa dang / chos la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / chos la bab pa dang
147a3(1): mang du thob pa rnams la brten cing bsnyen bkur byed pa dang slob dpom dang mkhan po rnams yang rgyal skyed cing bcus par gus par byed pa dang / chob yongs su tshol bas myi ngoms pa dang / nges su bkad pa rnams la bka' rno 'de shig
147a4(1): mthur bar 'dzidud pa dang / chos smra ba'i gang bag rnams la spyodod pa tsas du shes shing 'khyal pa kyi 'chol ba dang / kun 'dzi rang pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa khe lo byed pa dang / chos la slob 'apon gyi dpe khyed byed kyi
147a5(1): zang zing byed par chos stond pa dang ga shes rab kyi rtsa ba'i gnas thos pa dang / tshul bzhin gyi chos la spyod pa dang / je ltar thos pa'i chos la so sor brtag pa'i phyir mang du thos pa mu byed par byas pa dang / tshangs pa
147a6(1): spyod pa la gnas pa su byed par byos pa dang / rtag tu dben pa la sos 'ol bar byas pa dang / rjes su dran pa drug rjes su dram pa mdzag 'ang chags par 'gyur ba drug kyi 'dod pa dang / gus par byas ni tha
147a7(1): gnas drug yongs su rtse gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong 'khro ba myed pa'i sems kyis chos la spyod pa dang / rtend cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / myi 'gal ba'i las dang bya ba la 'jug pa dang / rnam par b.rang zhing
147a8(1): sgo gsum la sebs nges par rtog pa la byi grag pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs dang / sbyangs pa'i yor tam kun 'dzin pas yongs su gyi 'chab pa dang / ngal pa'i chos yongs su 'thung lal sems zhum pa byed pa dang / sems can la
147a9(1): bas snying rje che ba dang / chos ma skabs lus dang srog 'dod pa dang / ye shes la sab lta bas rtag tu nga rgyal myed pa dang / sems cas yongs su smind par bya ba la yongs su myi skyo ba ste/ 'di ni gzungs yongs su sbyangs pa byed pa zhes
147a10(1): rigs kyi bu de la gzungs gang zhe na/ kab kun bzung ba'i chos rnams myi brjed pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams myi rjed pa dang / dran pa rjes su dran pa dang / rtogs par khong du chub pa dang / blo gros 'dod pa dang / yi go myo zad pa
147b1(1): rgya masasum ma sa'a'amasas bya la su samabyasapa mas dra

147b3(1): kur rdzob skye mabs bstan pa shes pa dang / don ngam pa dbyer myed pa'i de kho sa stodang pa shes pa dang / bden pa la 'jug par nges pa 'jug pashes pa dang / dras pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang / yab dag pa
147b4(1): pa'i bcos 'grus myi 'gong pa shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par ro lad pa shes pa dang / dbang po'i rim pa shes pa dang / stobs la gnas par myi spyod par shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yam lag rtogs pa dang mthum pa shes pa
147b5(1): dang / lam la 'jug pa'i gnas pa shes pa dang / zhi gnas kyis sems gnas par shes pa dang / lhag mthong gi chos sgrol bar shes pa dang / rigs pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rjes su mthun par shes pa dang / so so yang dag
147b6(1): par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes skyed ge pa shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyind pa drug la 'jug pa shes pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi so so ci rigs par shes pa dang / sgra skang dang dag
147b7(1): ki kha ma la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi bdal stonang pa shes pa dang / don dbyer byed par shes pa dang / tshig 'phrul gyi zang par shes pa dang / sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba zhes pa dang / so so che rigs pa
147b8(1): chos stodang pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa dran pas 'dzind pa shes pa dang / tshig dang yi ge thams cad mtshams spyad pa'i nges pa'i tshig la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun nas nyen thongs pa dab ra hA/ 
147b9(1): byang ba ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa shes pa dang / rgyu dang / bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos thams cad la snang ba dang rab rib myed par shes pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs shes bya'o// lus dngangag dang sems dang 'dra ba'i
147b10(1): chos kun tu 'dzind pa gang yin pa de ni myi zad pa ste/ chos kyi 'char 'bab pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rgyas par byed pa de ni/ gzungs kyi tshul la 'jug
147b11(1): pa ye kye/ gsul lob pa las rgyam gyi tsham pams das kyi rnye par byung ba zhes bya'o// des kyi 'i ltang byang ma sems pa gsum thob ga satha na pa myo sa sar do// 
148a1(1): byang chub seMs dgang songs pa thogs par byed ci rgya gyi 'chad pa la rkag su sangs rgyas kyi byid kyis rnams kyis rlabs pa yid les/ rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi ban po 'di ga ni/ byang chub sems dpa 'dzes kyi
148a2(1): spobs pa yin te/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa spyad pa dang / spobs pa mgyogs pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa byed pa dang / spobs pargyun myi 'chad pa dang / shi nang tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang / 
148a3(1): zab mo la spobs pa dang / sna tshogs la spobs pa dang / legs par brgya dad pa'i spobs pa dang / zhum pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jigs pa myed pa'i spobs pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs sta nad pa'i nges pa'i ni/ 
148a4(1): spobs pa dang / mdo dang rtogs pa brjod pa dang / spos 'byung la spobs pa dang / kyi phul ba'i spobs pa dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba rab tu bstan pa pa myi zad pa la spobs pa dang / spobs pazhin dbugasal zhing gi na tu mdzes
148a5(1): pa dang / tshig gtsum zhing gzung ba'i spobs pa dang / chos ston pa 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs pa dang / lha'i 'khor da kyi brgyand kyi spobs pa dang / the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jig rten dpa'in

148a7(1): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyis byin kyis rlabs pa'i spobs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu nyi shu pa bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi spobasapa yir ro// po dag kyang yongs su sbyang ba bya ba nyi shul bzhis 'gyung zhe
148a8(1): nyi shu rtsa bzhi ga zhin 'di lta ste/ bla ba'i rag gcog sa myus pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// zung go gcig ces byas pa dang / song zhes bya ba lnga g.yol skyed pas spobs pa mgyogs par 'gyur ngo // nyor mongs zas 'bas
148a9(1): cad la byed pas spobs pa thogs pa byed par 'gyur ro// de la ma chags 'ang gnas pas spongs pa rgyu nad myi chad par 'gyur ro// phra ma'i tshig byed pas shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyur ro// rtend cing 'bre lang par
148a10(1): 'byung bya rtogs pas yab mo la spobs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa sna tshogs pa rdzogs pas snga tshogs la spobs par 'gyur ro// chung ma legs par brgyand te rab tu 'byidad pas legs pa'i spobs par 'gyung ngo // byang chub
148b1(1): kyi sems las myi nyams las zhum pa byed pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi phung po legs par ku na tu srungs pas 'jigs pa myed pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba deng dang
148b2(1): dril bu sna tshogs 'byind pas tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs stand pa'i nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang // rim 'gro byed pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa sngon tu 'gro bas mdo dang rtogs pa rjod pa
148b3(1): drod 'byung ba la spobs par 'gyur ngo ro// sdug sbal ba dang dayul ba dang / mgon byed pa la myi brnyes pas myi yulang pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// gter bye za pang sbyin pa dang / pha ro lang chos la spyod ba
148b4(1): cig rab tu dbye' ba kyi zang pa la spobs par 'gyur ro// tshig bden pa dang / 'thu ba byed pa dang / ngag chub mo myed pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan tha ng+yas spobs pa gi nang tu gamakha zhing 'dzes par 'gyur ngo // bla ma'i tshig tu
148b5(1): du skye gsod pa dang / gzhan gyi mig kyi gcod pas cig bcu ring de bzung ba'i bathos par 'gyur ro// rang gi yod ca kyi chos smras sa pas chos gdas pa 'bras bu 'ong ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro// bang/ 6
148b6(1): kha lci stod pa dang / gzhan la mya spong ba dang / phangs pa'i dngos po la ngas su gtong bas lha'i 'khor kyi rgyand kyi spobs par 'gyur ro// chos la slob dpon gyi dpel 'khyud myed pa dang / chos ji ltar thogs pa bzhin du ston bA
148b7(1): thesam thams cad gcod pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// stan chos thams cad shes pa dang / gzhan la myi gdon pa dang / nad pa rnams kyi ma ga yog byed pa dang / sma rab tu sbyid pas 'jig rte dad pa dang 'jig rted las 'das pa'i chos
148b8(1): thams cad la spobs par 'gyur ro// pha ro'ang la 'khrul pa'i skabs kyi 'chol ba dang / gzhan dag gi skud pa myi gleng ba dang / 'khrulang pa la myi rtogs pas 'khrul pa pa myed pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// sems ca 'ams cad la sos
148b9(1): snyoms pa dang / sems can thams cad la tshungs par spyod pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam la 'god pa dang / brnyid pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa thams cad don tu myi gnyer bas 'khor nga la byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba das
148b10(1): btang snyoms kyi spobs par 'gyur ro// bka' blo bde pa dang / nges pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / sems dka' ba dang / gzhan gyi rgyud la byug pa myi byed rtsipas skye ba'i dran pa 'i mngod par shes pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// 
149a1(1): theg pa chen po las myi nyams pa dang / theg pa dman pa myi 'dod pa dang / sems can la snying rje ba dang / sems can nan tan la 'god pas sangs rgyas kyis rlabs pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// sems can gzhan la
149a2(1): go bar byed pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// sems can gzhan la nang tu bya ba stonang pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyang tshim par byed pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// sos can gzhan gyi sos
149a3(1): dang mthun par stond pasu de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos dang yon tan dang ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni spobs pa phogs pa byed cing rgyun myi 'chad la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byi na kyis
149a4(1): rlabs kyis byir kyis rlabs pa yid no// rigs kyi bu sel gri ltas sa byang chub sems pa' skye ba dang 'chi'apho dang kur 'byung rnams la dbang pob pa yis sa sa/ rigs kyi bu chos 'acu gnyis dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes
149a5(1): dang 'chi grol dang 'byung ba rnams kha dbang thob pa yin no// bcu gnyis gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs shing rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyes la stend pa dang / lta ba shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas
149a6(1): kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge/ 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ldang ba zhes pa dang shes dang dang thapas lung su 'brelang ba dang / mdong bar shes pa ma nyams pa 'tho na
149a7(1): rang pas skyes pa dang mi 'byung bar so so rtogs pa dang / bsas pa bzhin skye ba dang / smos las yongs su rdzogs pa dang / semad sa sa pa'i byams pa la spyod pa dang snying de cher po sa res pang theb par
149a8(1): dang / chos la smras lta bur rtog pa dang / 'chi po byed pas 'pho zhing skye ba dang / chos kyi ma tshan nyid skyilas kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos la 'jug pa dang / byind mi log gi chos la yang dag pajig pa bzhi du rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas
149a9(1): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byi nad kyis rlabs kyis skye ste/ 'pho zhing 'byung ba dang / skye ba dpa'aphol pa dang / 'byung bar yang kyi sems pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i gang dang kAs tu ste sa ngas sems can gyi ror byed
149a10(1): ba'i skyes pa'i rabs stan 'tshang myong krongs myed pa'i skyes pa'i rabs de dag thams cad ni cha pa gnyis la gnas la gnas pa ste/ 'di lta ste mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa dang / snying rje chen po'i ba dang gnas pa'o/ 
149b1(1): rigs kyi bu'i sa da byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'phe'atho bas 'byung ba rnams la dbang na tham pa yid do// rigs kyi bu de ba de ltangs byang chub sems dpa' bdud pazhi'i las sub yang dag par ras zhing / sre da byer soms sa
149b2(1): cad yang dag par 'das shing / bdud dang phyir rgol pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpal chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes shing / rtogs pas phung po'i bdud las yang dag par 'ang / ji ltang na
149b3(1): pa'i chos la tshul bzhin so sor rtogs pas nyon mongs pa'i btung las yang dag par 'da'o// rtend cing 'brelang par 'byung ba rtogs pas 'chi ba dag gi bdud las yang dag par 'ang 'o// byang chub kyi sems khas kyi nyams pas ka khA'i bu'i bdud las la
149b4(1): gapasas so// sang des btud kyilas dmas 'ayos pa yin te/  des bdud gyi las rnams macos gang zhe na/ gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sa /  dud kyi ba klags kyi brnyed pa ste/ theg par sa pa 'dod pa bdun gyi sa dang / khye
149b5(1): kye sems kyi srung bar bdud kyi las dang / sems tsam thadang bar spyod pa bdud kyi las dang / skye ba la gnas pa'i tshul khribs bdud kyi lus dang / de bzhin du spyad te/ gzugs su bsngos pa'i 'thod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bya ba la sngor 'gru
149b6(1): dang / de la chags shing ro myang ba'i bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyis chos ngan pa la smod pa bdud kyi las dang / 'khor bas yongs su su ba bdud kyi las dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su myi sngo ba bdud kyi las dang / nyod 'ongs pa la smod pa bdud kyi
149b7(1): khas dang / ltung ba 'chab pa bdud kyi las dang / byang chub sems dpa' la sdang ba bdud kyi yas dang / byas pa rgyan gcod pa bdud kyi las dang / pha rol tu phyind pa rnams yongs su kyi tshol ba bdud kyi khas dang / das pa'i chos nya dnga'ang gyi
149b8(1): 'ad ba phun gyis sa thos la grob bod kyi be'am 'byung byed pa gung kyilas dang / gang mi dang 'bres pa ches gdong pa chung kyi las dang / mams cad thas pa sems pa yongs su sri sa par byed ba shesas dang
149b9(1): slu ba'i dngos po 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / tshul khrims 'cha lang pa rnam pa la khrong 'khro ba bdud kyi khas dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnas la byi gus pa bdud kyi las dang / nyan pos kyi sgrub pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i bdud kyi las dang / rang sangs
149b10(1): rgyas kyi beka pa can gyi rjes su 'jug pa bdud kyi las dang / dus ma yin par sgrub 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / snying rje chen po bor nas rigs la rtog pa bdud kyi las dang / 'dus ma byas 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang 'dus byos la spyod pa
150a1(1): kyi las dang / sems can gyi ci bya ba'i mchog la g.yel ba bdud kyi las dang / pargyal la gnas shing phyi 'argud pa dang / lce gnyis smra ba dang / g.yol sgyu dang ldan pa dang / bcos ma la dga' ba dang / byi drang ba dang rtsub cin
150a2(1): brlang ba dang / sdig la myi smod pa dang / chos drungs 'byind pa dang / thos pa cung zad tsam kyis chog par 'dzind pa dang / chos ma yin pa dos su gnyer ba dang / chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang / sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas pa cwa
150a3(1): pa dang / rnam par gyi gnond pa bdud kyi las dang / sems kyi drim mye rtogs pa bcud kyi yas dang / dge sbyong ki dri sa la myi rjes pa bdud kyi las te// rigs kyi bu ji tsam tu phyi dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa dang / dge ba'i chos 'dod 'a
150a4(1): thams cad ni bdud kyi las so// chos bzhis na bdud kyi las 'di dag las shi nang tu 'das te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems la rjed pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa pha rol tu phyind pa drug rlos
150a5(1): dang ba dang bco 'grus la gnas pa'i bag yod pa dang / babs ma khase ba la mangs te sems cam yongs su sbyin dbar byed pa dang / chos kyi tshul bab po la gnas te/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'chi dang bas
150a6(1): thams cad bcom pa yin no// tshigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad myed pa bsachags shing sems can bsas ca'atsho bar gyur pa yin zhe ma/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpal
150a7(1): ni sems can rnams la byams pas gnas pa yis/ 'byung po rnams la snying rje bar gnas pa yin/ bsam gtad rnams yang ma chags par gnas pa yin/ slo pa rnams la gdog pa thams cad yongs su gsong ba ste
150a8(1): babadanams dag kyis longs spyod ma mang ba yin/ bsam pa ngan pas lag na me po che yi mtho mar rgya med byed pas sems sa dang rlangs pa yis/ ma khrims songs su dag pas ba ma les myo pa sed/ 
150a9(1): sbyin thams cad khyab pas sems grol zhing sgo slebs pa myed pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pas gzungs dang skabs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing chab byed par 'gro bas mngon par shes pa 'i ye shes
150b1(1): ming mo/ drim pa pa 'om kyi 'byung ba ched tho zam po 'di dag sems ca thams cad kyi 'gro bar gyur pa de ba'i du bangag gis gi 'byung ba chen po 'di sa kyab sems cang bas bcad kyi 'tsho bar kyang bcig / bdang / 
150b2(1): myed pa acags shing sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma 'byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na
150b3(1): rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas pa dang gnas ma byingang ba'i bya ba shes pa stobs bcu yongs su spong bar bya ba tshang ba phyin pa yin/  dazag pa zang ba'i bya ba zhes pas kyi 'jigs pa pa'i yongs su sbyang 'a bya ba cang
150b4(1): phyinang pa yis// dus gsum la chags pa myed pa'i ye shes/  kyi bya ba shes pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brjo ba kyang yongs su skye bar bya' tsherang kyi rad pa yi / sangs kyi spyan gyi snang bye thob thas
150b5(1): sus lnga yongs su spang bar bya ba tshar ba byin pa yings byang chub kyi snying por 'grong ba thob pas mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya bas rang byings pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i man canas yang dag pas
150b6(1): bcad pas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba tha rang phyi nad pa yin/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad pas rtags pas lus dang ngag dang sems dang / mtshan dang dpe' byad 'azang po'i rgyun yongs su sbyang bar bya ba/ 
150b7(1): bye pa sa gyus pa tho pabs kyi mo sa su bya ba ca sa byed pa shes kyi sogs pa sa sa sa rgyas kyi chos pabs pa yongs pa smra bye pa
150b8(1): rigs kyi bu de ltar sa byed chub sems dpa 'a sangs rgyas rnams ma 'byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sos can rnams la nye mar gnas pa yis rashA / rigs kyi bu de la ji ltab ma byang chub sems dpa' 'argya ma tsho'i phyag bya'i ti
150b9(1): 'did thob cib sems can thams cad kyi sems dang pyod pa la myi chags pa yin zhes rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dbe nga 'angs bu'i gling ni/ sems cad rnams kyi gzugs snang baji snyed pa re da thams pad
151a1(1): 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rgyam po chen po la yod de/ de'i phyir rgya mtshol chen po zhes bya'o// de bzhin du sems cad pha bas cad kyi sems su sdang ba'am/ gzugs su sna pa' ma nga/ spar snang ba'i snyed
151a2(1): de dag thams cad rgya batsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi sdang ba gcig la snang bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir nga rgya bco la phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind ces bya'o// 'di lta ste dbye na ma/ rgya cho
151a3(1): chen po ni ro gcig pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos rnam par grol ba'i 'or shes pas ro gcig pa yin no// 'di lta ste dpe sa/ rgya mtsho 'a chen po ni dus las kyi yol ba yin no// de bzhin
151a4(1): du byang chub sems dpa' yang dus dang dus ma yin pa la so sor rtog pas/ byang chub kyi snying po'adus las mya yol lo// 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho' chen po na shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig myi gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub seMs
151a5(1): pasang yang bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / nyan pos/ dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems ca thams cad lhan cig kyi gnas so// 'di lnga ste dperas/ rgya mtsho chen po ni rtsu thams cad khrid pas khri ba 'amag
151a6(1): skyed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal ma yang mchos thos cad bzed pas chos kyi dbyings bri ba 'am gang par myi byed do// 'di la ste 'iras rgya mtsho cher po'i khatshom tshab byed do// 
151a7(1): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis tshad byed do// 'di ltar ste dper na rgyam po chen po ni zabacing gting bag dgal ba yin no// ro bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang za' ci nyar thos dbang bsangs rgyas
151a8(1): khakhams cad kyis gting dpaka dka' ba yin no// 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyam cho ma chen po mi sems can cang byed pa'i gnas yidan do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la ba sems can yongs su sbyi bar bya bachang byed pa'i sam
151a9(1): yin gyi 'di'i sus kyi chem po'i phyag tu'i ting nge 'dzid pa pa 'dus pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltang zhugs pa'i byang chub ses sbyang ba' mi sems ca thams cad kyi sems dang myong la phyi rnags pa yin so// rigs kyi
151a10(1): du de la ji lta na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin zhes/ chags pa zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la lta ba kun nas ldang bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' se ba kun nas ldang thas
151b1(1): nga dang bral bas chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no// 'di lta ste dper na/ rlung dmar ni nam mkha'i dkyil la gyi chags so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpal ni drus ma lta bu'i sos dang ldan
151b2(1): ba a sems can thams cad la myi chagasong // yang skyes bu dam pa de dag ni 'apyod pa dang cho ga'i chu la shes pa yin te/ de la cho ga ni dran pa'o// spyod pa ni rnam par myi g.yeng ba'o// de dag ni mun pa dang bral zhing sA pa 'tho
151b3(1): pa yin te/ de la mun pa zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la myi shes pa zhes bya'o// snang ba zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la ye shes thogs pa myed pa ste/ de'i phyir de dag sun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thol pa zhes bya'o// 
151b4(1): skyes bu dam pa de dag ni ye shes gzhan gyi drid la myi 'jog cing rang gis ye shes thob pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dgarab 'byung gi ye ye/ sa la mngon par gnas shing / sems can gzhan ye ges 'dod par byed pa
151b5(1): yin no// gang gi sa byang chub sems dpa' chos gtan la 'bebs ba'i ye shes bstan pa 'di la gzham dringal myi 'jog ci rang gis ye shes thob par gyurang pa de'i rtse sbyarab tu tham sa rung ba khyed pa'i
151b6(1): mtshan ma ldan na ba yongs su spangs nas su// byang chub phyir spos de ni zangad myi 'gyur / dargyal las kya ngang rgyal kun spangs nas// de ni ye ges tshogs rnams tshol bar byed// mtha' yas blo ldan dam pa'i
151b7(1): de bo nyid// kun mkhyend ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed// rgyal ba'i sras de sangs rgyas rjes dran pa// gzugs dang mtshan gyi chos su ma yin no// kang na sems dang yid ni myi rgyu ba// de ni mthur ba pa sangs rgyas
151b8(1): rjes su dras ga chos ni 'dod chags bral zhing rang bzhin dben// zhi zhi bzhi rtag tu mtshan ma skyed// gang zhig dmyigs pa thams cad bral gyu dpa// de 'ding chos ni rjes su drang ba yir// pags pa'i dge 'dun
152a1(1): legs par 'dod// snyoms pa byed cing tog rang dum tog dang // 'di ni gtong ba legs par rjes su dras// tshul khrims zag pa myed cing 'dus ma byas// lus dang ngas dang yid kyis 'jug pa byed// 'gyur
152a2(1): ba byed cing sring gzus gyi gnas pa// de'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yin// A ka bdag cing dri phyed nyom mongs myed// dka' ldan gnas pa rab srung po'i byung sa// sems cad dag pa de dag 'der dran zhing/ bdag
152a3(1): kyang myung tu de 'drang 'byub snyoms sems// de bzhir gshegs kyi de chos 'dzid pa'i// nyon mongs dngos po thams cad 'dzin myi byed// chos dang chos myin gnyis las rngam par grol// de 'dral de ni rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin de yin/ rgyar
152a4(1): bas byang chub mtshan nyid gang nyes pa / chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni yongs su 'dzim/ gang gis rtul myed mtha' 'di rab shes pa// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi chos 'dzin yin// bdag ni rab tu ngag pas sems can dag chos kur
152a5(1): dpa pa mkhas pas sus rtogs pa de ni sems dag rang bzhin 'od gsal te// sems can gang phyir rtag tu yongs smin byed// sems can khams rnams ma rung myi byed cing // de ni bri zhing kang ma thob pa myed// lta ba mong pa
152a6(1): rab tu spangs pakung bsnyon / 'de 'dra de ni sems cam mang po spyod 'jikra rkyen yul kun rab tu gang skonang pa// de ni sangs rgyas yul rab tu stonang / sangs kyis yul ni ram mkha 'tshungs pa se
152a7(1): de bzhin 'jig rten yul yang rab tu shes// sgra bskang dbyangs dang yi ge 'ams cad ni// braka cha 'dra bar de yis rab mthong zhing // de gas nya nad pa 'a shi nang tu yod byin bA/ de ltar rab tu shes pa gzungs thob bo/ 
152a8(1): kun da rgya 'dzid nga ring 'dzin cing klog pa dang // chos rnams snyanang pa'i rnam pa rab bcad kyang // bdag dang sems can chos su rlob sems byed// de ni gzungs la rab tu gnas pa yim// rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs la 'dzin
152a9(1): byed cing / legs par gsungs pas sems can tshim byed pa// dran dang ting nge 'dzind dang bral gyi 'gyur// gzungs dpar nges pa'i don tan 'di dag ko// chos ni rnam pa kun tub sags byed papa// chos la gyi 'phro dron
152a10(1): pa skyed pa'ang byin// dathebs klu ni chang rgyan 'bebs pa yang// de ltang de yang chos kyi rnam sang 'bebs/ yon tan 'byung nas rnams kyi spobs pa yid// 'ogs byed rgyang chad kyi 'chung dang // bamado sde song dras
152b1(1): bye ba rab tu ltar// sems ci srid po sa sems can 'du shes byed/ sangs rgyas ma bu' yis skayang ba bye stong du// rgyud kyis cam par chom 'di sa sod cig/ bosas pa 'i ba'i se sems can tshim par byed/ smom
152b2(1): pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas yon tan gnas mchog 'dri// thams cad nam mkha' 'dra ba zhes/ gang gis chos rnams kun kyi tshul shes la// sems cad srog dang gang zag myi 'dzin pa// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi dam chos
152b3(1): 'dzind// sems can thams cad shi nad tu mya ngan 'das// de dag de ltar kun tu skye ba myed// su'i bzod 'di dri myed 'od gsal ba// de ni stand pa 'dil bkra yod yin// phung po yang dag sgyu ma lta bur mthong // chos
152b4(1): dbyings ci 'dra khrims rnams shes// dbang po drug ni grong stong 'drar mthong ba// de ni phung po'i bdud las yang dag 'dral// smin pas rtsegs phung po lta dbur nyon mongs rnams// bka yod tshul bzhin rab tu rtog byed cing
152b5(1): chos la phyi tog rnam par skye rtog a// de ni nyos phongs bdud khas/ yang dag 'dal// gang zhig skye ba rtag tu skye skyer zhes// 'di las gang yapa' pho myed 'gro ba byed// chos rnam sa 'od myed song ba
152b6(1): skyed shes pa/ de ni 'chi bdag bdud kyi dbang kyi 'gro// ke de'i ga g.yol dang rlom sems myi byed cing // byang chub gnas kyang byang chub 'thunas byed/ bdag dang sems can 'jug kyang rnying rje bre 'jug pa
152b7(1): de ni dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud brtul lo// rnam shes ye shes gnyis ni mnyam par mthong // 'dus byas myi gnas 'dus ma byas la myim//  'gro ba'i sems ni sku mar 'dra mthong ba// de ni sems dpa'i rdzib
152b8(1): ba skyed pa yin// pha ro khad tshu rol dgang la yang myi chags la// / chos ldan gru ni/ yang dag su sbyong zhing // sems can grol yang sems cad 'du shes byed// mnyam pa zhes bya byang chub sems dpal de// srid
152b9(1): ba gsum po 'brog 'gron 'drab dang / stong bar 'byung ba byed pa rab tu shes// las kyi ris kyis rtag tu sems ca sgrol// de mi de dang po bdud mi las gnong ba/ 'dzangs pa de ni tshul dang tshul gyim mkha / 
152b10(1): chos rnams 'dod nas stong par rab tu shes// tshul dang rigs pas mya ngan 'das pa 'dzud// byang chub sems dpal de ni 'dre nad ces bya// sems kyi rgyud ni gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur // sems ni seMs la rnams kyang
153a1(1): tshams kyi sbyor// 'gro ba'i sems chung de dga' ba shes pa// byang chub sems dpal yongs su 'drend ces bya'o// nam ma kha'i ngo bo nyid dang rgya hA ltar // chos rnams thams cad dag cing rnam dag ces/ nyon mongs
153a2(1): kun btang 'dre bar myi byed pa/ sems can dag pa de ni ma spang la// ka bzhig chos gcig gi ni chos rnams kun// sgyu ma spyig rgya 'dra bar bzung byed dang // gsog dang mum 'dang rtag pa myed par shes// de ni byang
153a3(1): chub snying por myur tu 'gro// / chos gtan la 'bebs pa stand pa 'di bshad pa na// lha dang myi dang myi 'am mi dang lho phye chen po'i srog chags khrag khIg phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis/ bla na myed pa yang dag 'ang rdzogs pa li
153a4(1): byang chub sems skyed do// byang chub sems dpa' gsum khri gnyis stong ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyurd to// stong sum gyi stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos
153a5(1): so// snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur pa to// lha brgya stong dag kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs shing sil snyan dag kyang bkrol nas/ 'di skad ces gang dag bstanang ba 'di thos ngas thos pa dpa'adzind 'dang
153a6(1): byas te phyag bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas 'byung bar gyur pan/ chos 'di lta bu 'di rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa bsam gyis phyi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang mthong ba ched du 'arjod do// 
153a7(1): de nas bcom pa ldan 'das kyis zhums pa lung stand pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mam mkha'i mdzod mngon tu rangs par mdzad pas mu tig ki pra la byed cing rnam par dag pa stong sum yongs su gang ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la ma
153a8(1): ra g.yo lang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes ni chags pa myi mang la de'i sgrib pa bye ma ngal ba/ bstanang pa ni kun gyi chang / de bzhi gshegs pa ri sems ca 'thas cad
153a9(1): kyi sems la gzigs shing dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa ye shes la mkhas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'dra ba'i chos kyi tshul gyis rnam par stand pa des 'khor nga thams cad kyi sems tshim par bya dad do// 
153b1(1): theg pa chen po 'di yang rgyas par brjod pa mdzad par gyurd to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpal 'di dag la yang chos kyi sdang ba cher pos rgyas par mdzad par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de ba'i mashes
153b2(1): bas bdag la yang chos 'byung ba'i sgo sta nang pas chos 'byung ba'i sgos de chos 'byung ba'i sgo cheng myeg mchis pa bstanang par bgyi'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byung bar spobs pa zhes bya ba'i 'khor nga de nyid du 'dus pa/ 
153b3(1): gyur te 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kang khyod kyi phying nam ma khal ma 'od ces bya ba de ci khyod kyi nam ma kha lnga su dzod dam/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ nam mkha la 'i khe dzam
153b4(1): mdzod do// myur bas spobs pas smra ba rig kyi bu nam mkha'i mdzod kyi bye brag bdag cag gis kyang lta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems nga dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod la bkakhas ca lang pa/ rigs kyi bru khyod kyis nam ma
153b5(1): mdzod kyi khyad par ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' sa dkyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byung bar spobs pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yid la ga pa 'dod pa de kho bos nas mkha' khas cha
153b6(1): dpa' bo/ pa de mas byang chub sems dpa' gyung bar spothos pa 'di ltas du sa mas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring po che srung ba la'i dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams yangs bkod ba zhes bya ba ma 'ong bab bcad dpa 'ang spang ba zhes
153b7(1): bya ba'i pad ma/ rkyang ni rgyang grags kyi tshad/ 'dab ma bye ba phrag mang po 'jam zhing gzhol pa/ kos ka e lis di ka ltar reg na bde ba dris ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing khyab pa kha dog mang po brgya stong dang ldan pa mthong ma yi bdu 'obal zhing chog kyi shes
153b8(1): pad ma de mthong ba dang dri snams pas/ byang chub sems dpal de ting nge 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur 'de/ bdag gis ma 'ob ste/ 'khor 'di nge 'dra ba'i ba ma'i chang phob shig snyam pas dang / byang chub sems dpal byung bar smos
153b9(1): pas byams sa thag kya se nas byang chub sems dpe'amasu mkha'i mdzod kyis byings kyis rlabs kyis rnam sa kha'i ngos las de 'dra ba'i pang pa'i chab mngor bapa'abab ste/ der 'khor de dag thams cad 'ad ma de dag gi dri tsho 'ing
153b10(1): mthong bas pa dag pa'i mas shes bya ba'i nge 'bris la sgoms pa zhugs so// lakhor de lams tha ting nge 'dzin las 'angs te/ byang chub sems dpa' nas ma kha'i 'dod pa phyag sal ras 'di gad ces ze ce

154a2(1): bya ba 'dus par gyur da te/ 'dug pa des// byang chub sems dpal na pa ma khal mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkhal las ser gyi phye'i cher po ba shig/ byang chub sems dpal rin ces bkod kyis tshis
154a3(1): 'di skad ces smras pa zag tu/ de'i mod la rnam ma khal las gape phye lungs mngon 'a pa 'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpal rin cen bkod kyis/ byang chub sems nga' lanas ma kha'i mdzod pa 'di skad ces smras pa/

155a9(1): ya yongs su smyi dang bar byas par gyur to// de das byang chub sems dpal kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba de 'di snyam tu sems so// byang chub sems dpakha ma mkhal mdzod kyi bkod 'i 'jig rten 'di 'gal shig sa 'am/ 'jig rten kyi
155a10(1): khams gzhan na yang yod snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba'i sems kyi kun tu rtog pa sems kyis shes so// shes ras kyang / byang chub sems dpa' kur tu snang
155b1(1): ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ gA rigs kyi bu khyong gi nang tu drim byed cig gidang tunas par dag pa'i lha'i dbyig nyed narigs kyi spyod kyis phyogs bcu 'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su li la tho ltos shika/ de nas byang chub sems dpa lags su
155b2(1): bas lha'i dbyig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su ltos na des phyogs/ bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs myed dpag tu myed pa dag na ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ring po che thams cad kyi char rab tu 'bab pa dang / chos kyi
155b3(1): sgra thams cad grag pa de bzhin 'du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ma yang / mtshang ma lhag kyang ma zhugs par 'di lta bu'i bya ba rnams rab tu byung bar mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba ngo mtsha rang tu gyurang nas/ byang chub se/ 
155b4(1): nam mkha' mdzod kyi smod lam gyi byind kyis rlabs grub pa de ni bsam kyis phyi khyab pa ste/ ka lar yang kacig cang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skyes bu da ma pas 'di 'dral ba'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo// zhes ched du brjod

155b6(1): 'bab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dbul nam ma khasu mdzod kyis rin po che'i char dang chos kyi char gyi mo 'phrul 'di gnang 'as/ 'thang pa las 'das pa'i sems cad rnapas byang chub tu srems skyes

155b10(1): srod/ sring mo ngas padag bdag gi kye ji lta ba bzhin du khrid cig/ de nas yud myed de dag gis ji lta bu dang rang gi khyo gang yin pa khri nas dga' gul yid rangs shipa rab tu dag la ste yid bde ba skyes ras rang rang gi khyeb du dong ngo // dem kyi
156a1(1): sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag gis zhag bdun tu bud byed de dag ci ltar bra byed pa yang bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir myi ldog pa de lta de ltar sbyid par byas so// de nas yang bung byed lnga brgya po de dag/ byang chub sos
156a2(1): dbu' nas mkha' mdzod kyi bar du legs nas tshigs su 'drang pa 'di dag smras so// sa chos kyi rang bzhid stob la sgyum 'dra// chos kyi mtsham nyid de ni sdom sa 'tsha lang // de phyir khyod kyis sprulang pa'i khyom ma yang te// bdag sag theg pa 'o/ 
156a3(1): mchog la de smi bgyis/ chos 'di thams cad yang dag sprul pa ste// g.yo' pa myed cing byed myed snga ngas stong // zag myed ye shes dag gis rab rtogs te// slan chad nyon mongs dbang du myi mchi'o// byang chub mchog gi sems mi
156a4(1): bskyed par bgyil// sems can thams cad 'gron tu gnyer bar bgyi// sems cad rgya chen khyod kyis phab pa bzhin// bdag cag gis kyang chos mchog 'char pa/ phab// / 'dren mchog thub pas de dag lung stand pas// khyed cag ma 'ongs dus ma
156a5(1): 'gyur ba nika/ spyad pa spyad nas rgyal ba'i dbang po dag nga / gi nad tu dul/ zhes bya ba'i bder gshegs gyur nga // yang de'i tshe na myi lnga brgya gsad par chad de// gsod du khrid pa las de dag gis bar sA pa las sems can rnams byang

156a7(1): so// de nas de dag phams cad shi bas 'jig skrag pas sgra skad gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la phyag lo zhes tshig de skad smras so// tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu skad cig

156b3(1): ras chos zung nig byin te/ grogs po dag ras bcos bu zung 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la gso yod cig/ de dag thams cad kyis ras bcos bu phung de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par gsolang to// de dag thams cad bcom

156b7(1): ba ga ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub de ni nam ma kha'i ngobo nyid kyis tshan nyid de de la 'angag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams reng spos pas gdebs na nas mkhal la sadzod kyi gabs kyi pad kyi rengs so// yang thod kyis rnam sa la mdzod
